I will save as many people as I can. That is my duty.
—Albert, Levin Champion

I will do my duty. That will save many lives.
—Yurius, Levin Duke

Deal X damage to an enemy follower. X equals the attack of the highest-attack Commander follower in your hand.
Enhance (5): Deal X damage to all enemy followers instead.
117234010.baseFlair_: Many storms rage on the battlefield, but he is the true eye of the tempest.

713234010.baseEffect_:
Deal X damage to an enemy follower. X equals the attack of the highest-attack Commander follower in your hand.
Enhance (5): Deal X damage to all enemy followers instead.
713234010.baseFlair_: Yes, Your Majesty. I have no intention of giving this job to anyone else. The one who will kill Zero shall be me.

Rally (7): Recover 1 play point.
121234010.baseFlair_: "A friendly bout may tell us what we want to know about each other!" The princess's offering releases the lonely girl from her pain—her first gift from her first friend. The Boneclaw dies, and the proud Stoneclaw takes her first steps. —Tales from Naterra, Entry 3

123234010.baseEffect_:

If you've fused or played at least 4 other Loot cards this match, deal 4 damage instead and restore 4 defense to your leader.
123234010.baseFlair_:
"It seems my trial's sated you—for now. That small taste of success will whet your appetite for more." —Octrice, Hollow Usurpation
"Hah! Indeed it has. I look forward to crossing blades again." —Kagemitsu, Lost Samurai

124234010.baseEffect_:
Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower.
Put a Glittering Gold into your hand. If you have more evolution points than your opponent, subtract 1 from its cost. (You have 0 evolution points on turns you are unable to evolve.)
124234010.baseFlair_:
Bahaha! Your buddy tricked you to steal your most beloved treasure, and the law won't give you the time of day? Well... you came to the right place! Come on, gang, we've got work!
—Inn on the Outskirts of Town, Day 3

900244020.baseEffect_:
Give +1/+0 to an allied follower.
If an allied Naterran Great Tree is in play, give +2/+1 instead.
900244020.baseFlair_: I am the Forest King. And my blade will illuminate the forest.

104213010.baseEffect_:
Countdown (3)
At the end of your turn, randomly discard 1 of the highest-cost cards in your hand. Then draw a card.
104213010.baseFlair_: Let's get rid of all this clutter!

101232020.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, give +1/+0 to a random allied Officer follower.
101232020.baseFlair_: A knight knows no shame like wounds on her back. We know no way but forward.

100211020.baseFlair_: Brothers and sisters, let steel and blade do the talking today! The front lines belong to us!
100211020.evoFlair_: A battlefield knows no bounds; war invariably begets war. Submit to this verity, and fight until you can fight no more!

100211060.baseFlair_: Please! I, not her, am this village's number one kunoichi! You'd do well to remember it, too... All right, let's do thi—Hey! Are you even listening to me?
100211060.evoFlair_: You want proof I'm a cut above her? Fine! No one can resist my feminine wiles, you'll see. What? What do you mean, "No thanks"?

101211020.baseEffect_: Whenever an allied Commander card comes into play, gain +1/+0 until the end of your turn.
101211020.baseFlair_: I will fight! For my land, my family, and, above all, my cherished friends!
101211020.evoFlair_: His final breath as I cradled his limp, cold body haunts me to this day—"Live..." And so I shall in his stead!

101211030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give +1/+0 to an allied Officer follower.
101211030.baseFlair_: We privileged are sworn to a lifelong duty of shepherding the weak. Follow me and see that I honor my pledge!
101211030.evoFlair_: Whatever hellish eventuality lies ahead, I will retreat from no evil. Not as long as royal blood flows through these veins!

101211040.baseFlair_: No beast has stood its ground against my wind-imbued blade!
101211040.evoFlair_: Years of training have led me to this day. Now feel the full force of my elemental mastery!

101211050.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Gain Storm if an allied Commander card is in play.
101211050.baseFlair_: The front lines serve as this elite centaur's stomping ground. Many a fortress has trembled at the mere sight of his dragonscale spear.
101211050.evoFlair_: To hear the centaur's name is enough to fill any enemy with a dread so fierce their capitulation is all but guaranteed. The beast's unwavering force and conviction claimed victory in much haste.

101211110.baseFlair_: Allow me the honor of carving passage through their front line, for I can think no higher purpose for my lance and myself!
101211110.evoFlair_: This lance will guide my allies onward to victory! As long as I stand, there is nothing to fear!

102211020.baseEffect_: Whenever another follower evolves, summon a Knight.
102211020.baseFlair_: Fearless warriors! Rally to my flag!
102211020.evoFlair_: Come to me, my brothers and sisters! Under my flag, we march onward to glory!

103211050.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Gain +1/+1 and Bane if 3 or more enemy followers are in play.
103211050.baseFlair_: No matter how many come to challenge me, they'll all end up as rust on my sword!
103211050.evoFlair_: It's quite a trick to stay a step ahead of my sword! But if you care to try, come and get me, mighty general!

104211020.baseFlair_: These blue seas are ours. By my blade and my uniform, I will end the monsters that pollute these waters to the depths!
104211020.evoFlair_: Monsters are nothing to worry about, as I am a shining star in the royal navy! These waters belong to us, and none can stand against me here!

108211030.baseFlair_: I picked him up on the side of the road. Figured, why not, I'll teach him a trick or two. But you should've seen my face when he figured out how to hold a sword. —A chivalric order member
108211030.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
108211030.evoFlair_: Guess I picked him up on a whim. But, wow, that bear is something! I'd like to see any human do tricks like him. My guard's up, though; I'll tell you that. —A chivalric order member

109211030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Gain +3/+3. Then draw cards until there are 5 cards in your hand.
109211030.baseFlair_: I used to be a lily-livered brat, utterly terrified of everything around me. But look at me now! I fear nothing! Here, you can have this—pick it up! Now kiss the ring!
109211030.evoFlair_: Those same charlatans that once laughed at and made a fool of me... now they try to butter me up with their phony pleasantries! Ha! Money is power—an absolute power that can't be denied by anyone!

110211030.baseEffect_:
Clash: Gain +1/+1. Randomly put 1 of the following cards into your hand.
-Gilded Blade
-Gilded Goblet
-Gilded Boots
-Gilded Necklace
110211030.baseFlair_: Take and take again. If it has merit, it's ours; if it has value, it's ours. Seize everything, leave nothing.
110211030.evoFlair_:
The First Step: Remember
Whether riches concealed or riches revealed, the wealth of this world belongs to us. Remember this.
—Teachings of the Usurping Thief

111211030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Discard a card from your hand. Draw a card.
111211030.baseFlair_: There are many types of merchants. Clothes merchants, fruit sellers, landlords. I am none of those. What I sell is violence. I'm a warmonger.
111211030.evoFlair_: If you want world peace, you need the power to create balance. Laugh all you want; I know it's a strange thing for an arms dealer to say. But you'll thank me when you leave this battlefield alive.

112211010.baseFlair_: The source of the core's metamorphosis was a soldier on the battlefield. The strange components incorporated into the cannon exhibited fearsome performance. —Commander's Report, Part 1
112211010.evoFlair_: It was purely accidental, but this new weapon has achieved even greater results than we expected. The recharging time could be improved though, since it allows enemies to approach. —Battle Log, Part 1

112211020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Gain +4/+4 and give +0/+2 to all other allied followers.
During your turn, whenever another allied follower evolves, give it +0/+2.
112211020.baseFlair_: Do not falter! Victory is still within our reach, so long as we stand our ground. Past this battle, an era of peace awaits!
112211020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
112211020.evoFlair_: There is nothing to fear! Put your faith in me. A true warrior wears an injury on the battlefield like a badge of pride. The path to peace dwells within a soul that is patient and unyielding!

113211020.baseFlair_: The whole reason I joined the Sky Knights was to fight alongside the super cute captain... And now I have to serve in the rear guard?
113211020.evoEffect_: Evolve: If there are any Levin cards in your hand, deal 3 damage to an enemy follower.
113211020.evoFlair_: The only part of the captain I can see is his back. The only things I get a good look at are those dopey opponents. Sigh, happiness is a long way away...

114211030.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Put a Naterran Great Tree into your hand.
If there are fewer allied followers than enemy followers in play, recover 1 play point.
114211030.baseFlair_:
Your halberd strikes are more fearsome than savage claws which tear into hapless prey! Every swing of your axe rends foes in two! We beastfolk have awoken to our true nature and shall reign supreme!
—Hordes singing the praises of their warrior brethren
114211030.evoFlair_:
Your halberd strikes are more fearsome than savage claws which tear into hapless prey! As learned as humans may be, their actions reek of foolishness! Meanwhile we embrace both our savagery and wit!
—Hordes seeing off their warrior brethren

115211020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Gain +2/+2 and evolve this follower.
Clash: Gain +1/+1.
115211020.baseFlair_:
To war. Large and small combined, thirty battles break out. Samurai of every region, every army, have their own unique fighting styles. As well as their own secret techniques.
—Takenaga Era, Year 0: Fierce Battle
115211020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
115211020.evoFlair_:
As the thirty battles converge into ten, the conflict becomes increasingly violent. The ruthless war becomes a whetstone upon which the samurai hone their skill.
—Hanori Era, Year 6: Escalating Turmoil

116211010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If you have at least 3 other Officer cards in your hand, gain +2/+0 and Rush. If you have at least 3 other Machina cards in your hand, draw a card.
116211010.baseFlair_:
The source of the core's metamorphosis was discovered by a straggling soldier. Parts of it can be used to enhance weaponry and transport methods. This development should increase our resupply efficiency by leaps.
—Veteran Commander's Report
116211010.evoFlair_:
To fight like the beastfolk—relying on individual talent—is too unpredictable a stratagem. A homogeneous, replaceable force erases this inconsistency. In war, victory goes to those who can produce the greater numbers.
—Distinguished Sergeant

117211030.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Rally (7) - Evolve this follower.
Last Words: Put a Gilded Boots into your hand.
117211030.baseFlair_:
Your Majesty and noble guards:
Tomorrow, when the moon's at its peak, I'll come for your valuables. I'll invade from the front gate and slip through the hidden corridor via the throne room. I look forward to our transaction. —Honorable Thief's Tip-off Note
117211030.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
117211030.evoFlair_:
Just leave that honest thief be. There's no point in hiring protection. He's gone out of his way to politely tell us his plans and is still confident he can pull off his heist.
—Lord of a Neighboring Country

118211020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Put a Dutiful Steed into your hand.

WANTED: NAHTNAUGHT'S THUGS
Bounty: 5000 gold per head
Offenses: Organizing crime, attacking saloons

118211020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
118211020.evoFlair_:
WANTED: NAHTNAUGHT'S THUGS
Must be alive.
Known to employ group tactics, always looks for the high ground.
Avoid their boss. She is NOT wanted.

120211010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give Bane to another allied follower.
120211010.baseFlair_: In a ballroom filled with glittering chandeliers and colorfully attired guests, a lone flower leans against the wall. Bloodred petals unfurl into a smile, striking the heart of her target.
120211010.evoFlair_: The wallflower's breathtaking steps and riveting form draw her admirer in, like a drunken bee to nectar. It happens in a flash—as he approaches, the wingbeats of his heart flutter frantically, then stop.

121211010.baseEffect_:
Ambush.
Fanfare: Enhance (6) - Gain +1/+1. Destroy an enemy follower.
121211010.baseFlair_: We will never forget our murdered comrades, nor the future that was stolen from them. But the fallen sun has changed its course... Will they truly become the light that leads Isunia to a better tomorrow? We will be watching, from the shadows.
121211010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
121211010.evoFlair_: Under a full moon, they dart from shadow to shadow, cleaning up filth as they go. Though they be reviled for their deeds, they will do what they must in the name of restoration. They are the lunar light that shines over Isunia—they are Countersolari.

121211030.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Draw a card.
Rally (10): Draw 2 cards instead.
121211030.baseFlair_:
A normal flying squirrel merely rides on the wind. A battle-trained flying squirrel brings victory on the wind.
—Tactical Guide to Battlefront Beasts, Beginner's Edition
121211030.evoFlair_:
"Cap'n! The squirrels are refusing to fly out!"
"What do you expect? These winds'll just blow 'em off course!"
—Harried Battlefield Conversation Between a Captain and Officer

122211020.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Rally (10) - Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower and then 1 damage to the enemy leader.
122211020.baseFlair_: Whether you're scouting ahead, delivering messages and supplies, or raiding the enemy—when you're part of a cavalry, you're never too far from a friend.
122211020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
122211020.evoFlair_: I once thought myself to be an everyday, run-of-the-mill soldier. But thanks to my comrades, I've started feeling like a hero... It looks like you're in trouble. I'm here to help.

123211020.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Strike: Put a Gilded Goblet into your hand.
123211020.baseFlair_: Coin doesn't belong locked up in a coffer. If the rich folk ain't gonna use it, I'll give it to people who will. That'll show 'em!
123211020.evoFlair_: Who do you wanna see livin' the good life? Some nasty old scrooge, or this absolutely adorable cat? Look at 'im! He's goin' places, gonna make someone real happy!

124211010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Glittering Gold into your hand. Then, if at least 3 Glittering Golds have been added to your hand this match, evolve this follower.
124211010.baseFlair_:
You cityfolk are always so busy, busy, busy! Why not take the time to treat yourself, ribbit? You there, with the withered face. Fancy a night at our inn? Oh, so you've heard of us? Excellent! Follow me, then. Come, come!
—Inn on the Outskirts of Town, Day 1
124211010.evoFlair_:
Enjoy your stay! ...Ugh, can't believe I'm still stuck running the hotel. It's just a front! When's Boss gonna let us get back to our real work?
—Rantings of "Hopper"

125211010.baseEffect_:
Ambush.
Fanfare: Put a Gilded Boots into your hand.
125211010.baseFlair_: The royal family's so busy sittin' high and mighty on their throne, they don't bother looking at the small folk scurryin' at their feet. Well, you can't miss what you can't see, can ya?
125211010.evoEffect_:
Ambush.
Evolve: Discard a card from your hand. Draw 2 cards.
125211010.evoFlair_:
"What do you mean the royal jewels are gone?! That underground vault's supposed to be secure!"
"They must've slipped in during the ruckus after the crown was stolen..."
—Royal Vault Guards

125211020.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Restore 2 defense to your leader. If any allied Commander cards are in play, give your leader the following effect: The next time your leader takes damage, reduce that damage to 0.
125211020.baseFlair_: Sorry for keeping you waiting, my sisters-in-arms! I've returned successfully from my mission, and will now join my fellow Luminous Knights at the front line!
125211020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
125211020.evoFlair_:
Now that we're all in position, we can advance in earnest.
—Radiant Luminous Mage
We've nothing to fear! Luminous Knights, advance!
—Steeled Luminous Knight

126211010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to an enemy follower. If any damaged allied followers are in play, deal 2 damage instead and then deal 2 damage to the enemy leader.
126211010.baseFlair_:
If you really love something, then you can never let it go! That's what my hero taught me!
—Ren Kazamatsuri
126211010.evoFlair_:
You might worry about being judged or not fitting in, but if it brings you joy, then that's all that matters!
—Ren Kazamatsuri

126211020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Discard a card from your hand and put a copy of it into your deck. Draw a card. If a Commander card was discarded, gain +0/+1.
126211020.baseFlair_:
"A pure knight is a paradoxical notion," they all would say. "Swords are for killing."
She could only nod and mutter, "My intention is pure—that much I know."
126211020.evoFlair_: A crimson-dyed battlefield shimmers under the full moon. The lone figure of a knight can be seen rushing amid piles of debris to save the wounded. Can you call such behavior anything but pure?

127211020.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Last Words: Summon a Knight.
127211020.baseFlair_: "Raise your blades for your homeland!" Hah. What a load of crock. My comrades, today I take my leave of the Order. I will never again wield my blade for the sake of another—this I swear!
127211020.evoFlair_: Captain, is everything all right? What do you mean, "Why did you come?" I heard your life was in peril—I came to offer my blade to an ally in need!

128211020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a random Commander card from your deck into your hand. Rally (10): Evolve this follower.
128211020.baseFlair_:
They can't seriously expect an exchange student to keep up with lessons like these... I-I don't even know what "polliwog" means! But... they swore, they can make a hero out of me.
—Légen Exchange Experience
128211020.evoFlair_:
Haha, sounds like they had you working hard. Your control of mana is worlds better than it was before, though! ...Now I'm starting to wish I went to Légen too.
—Owen, Exchange Program Afterparty

128211030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Gilded Blade into your hand.
128211030.baseFlair_: The penguin's mightier than the sword! All I need to fight's my own two flippers, so baddies beware! This bird's gonna be the bea—peak of martial artists!
128211030.evoEffect_: Evolve: Put a Gilded Necklace into your hand.
128211030.evoFlair_: Yeah, you heard me! I'm bringin' flippers to a fist fight! C-can we, um... skip the throwing down the gauntlet bit though? I kinda need them...

900211030.baseFlair_: They call me the Knight of Steel, and my loyalty to my master is as firm and unbending as that metal itself.
900211030.evoFlair_: My faith is as hard and unwavering as steel. My will to fight shall never falter.

900211080.baseEffect_:
Drain.
Last Words: Put a Gilded Goblet into your hand.
900211080.baseFlair_: I swore to the cap'n I'd do as I please. It's the queen I obey, but that's my own choice. Get in my way and I'll cut ya down without mercy.
900211080.evoFlair_:
A meeting on rough waters. The words spoken there: do as you please.
"Obey or not—the choice is always yours! You're the one who steers through the seaways!"

900211090.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Last Words: Put a Gilded Boots into your hand.
900211090.baseFlair_: I swore to the cap'n I'd be strong. That's how I got it in my head—I'd be a thundering wave of strength. Lemme show you what me and this cannon can do!
900211090.evoFlair_:
A meeting on rough waters. The words spoken there: be strong.
"Use your own power to stand tall on the sea! Never let your strength waver!"

900211100.baseEffect_:
Follower Strike: Deal 1 damage to the enemy follower.
Last Words: Put a Gilded Blade into your hand.
900211100.baseFlair_: I swore to the cap'n I'd be chaos incarnate. I'd shatter the fetters o' the law 'n' do whatever I want on the seas! Now here's where I go my own way!
900211100.evoFlair_:
A meeting on rough waters. The words spoken there: be chaos incarnate.
"We are pirates, the wreakers of havoc! Rules and manners are meant to be drowned!"

101221010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a random Commander card from your deck into your hand.
101221010.baseFlair_: His Lordship will be home any minute! All staff to their stations at once!
101221010.evoFlair_: His Lordship has arrived! I want to see smiles so wide you blind him with your pearly whites, people!

101221020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give Ambush to an allied Commander follower.
101221020.baseFlair_: By all means, follow your precious rules of engagement. Let's just see who walks away life intact.
101221020.evoFlair_: With deadened movement and obscured approach, I take the life of my foe. I wonder, do you even know what it means to go to war?

101221080.baseFlair_: The Luminous Knights will not rest until the forces of foulness crawl back from whence they came. Blessed Light, guide us, and may our ever-burning hope stay the darkness!
101221080.evoEffect_: Evolve: Give all other allied followers +1/+0 until the end of the turn.
101221080.evoFlair_: Hear this solemn vow. By the holy light of my sword and armor, and the hopes and dreams of those I swore to protect, I do declare that no evil shall escape my wrath today!

101221090.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give +1/+0 to an allied 1-play-point follower.
101221090.baseFlair_: Exhausted already, eh rookie? Disgraceful! Such lethargy is sure to prevent you from ever becoming a knight worthy of the name!
101221090.evoFlair_: The battlefield is a brutal place, and your enemies will not wait for you to become a worthy warrior. Now come! Let us fight together!

102221010.baseFlair_: My job's to stay at your side, Princess. I can't very well let you travel on your own!
102221010.evoEffect_: Evolve: Gain +1/+1 if an allied Commander card is in play.
102221010.evoFlair_: Something tells me that she's in trouble. I'm on my way, Princess. Me and my rifle can keep you safe!

103221030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Gain +1/+0 and Ward if you have a Commander card in play.
103221030.baseFlair_: Amelia is doing everything she can to carry this order. What kind of man would I be not to do my part?
103221030.evoFlair_: All of us want to do everything we can to back Amelia up. That means training every single day! The knightly order of Amelia won't back down from any challenge!

105221030.baseEffect_: Whenever an enemy follower is destroyed, gain +1/+0.
105221030.baseFlair_: This hedgehog is considered a dangerous nuisance by warriors in battle. The mysterious beast is reputed to gnaw on blades.
105221030.evoFlair_: The bladed hedgehog seeks battlefields where it might find quality swords. Soldiers who accidentally step on the beast have been known to desert shortly afterward.

106221010.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: Enhance (6) - Gain Bane until the end of the turn. Reduce damage to this follower to 0 until the end of the turn.
106221010.baseFlair_: Although this warrior is the progeny of a god, he is a reckless mad dog. He wanders an eternal battlefield, wielding both secret runes and formidable spearplay.
106221010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
106221010.evoFlair_: The magic spear he wields is called Gáe Bulg. It always pierces its target, even if that target is a god. When he draws this weapon, his opponents can expect to die an honorable death.

702221010.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: Enhance (6) - Gain Bane until the end of the turn. Reduce damage to this follower to 0 until the end of the turn.
702221010.baseFlair_:
They say that only the swiftest heroes are chosen to be Lancers, and you stand a head and shoulders above them. I would say that there aren't even three spearmen of your skill in the world.
—Servant, Archer
702221010.evoEffect_:
(Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)

(This card will be treated as a Cuhullin.)
702221010.evoFlair_:
It strikes for the heart, and its aim is impeccable. In which case, taking the blow head-on is the only way.
—Servant, Archer

107221020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Enhance (4) - Gain +1/+2.
At the end of your turn, restore 1 defense to this follower.
107221020.baseFlair_: If I were just in it for the cash, I wouldn't mind dying. But this is for my home—my country! I mustn't perish here, for I must return someday to the land I love.
107221020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
107221020.evoFlair_: Being a soldier has never been easy, but I'll do what I must for my homeland. For someone awaits my return, and love has only given me strength!

108221020.baseFlair_: Yup, I'm from the country all right. But I'm a hell of a fighter if my pa was. I bet I can show you thing or two!
108221020.evoFlair_: Yup, I'm from the country all right. My ma fed me good, so I grew up big and tough. I know one thing though: I ain't about to lose to no city boy!

113221010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Give an allied Officer follower +1/+0.
Enhance (5): Give that follower Storm.
113221010.baseFlair_:
"On my honor, I vow to fight fair and upright!"
Standing before the treacherous enemy, she refuses to bend. Her stance stokes the battle spirit of her students.
"We can't let that bunch of cowards harm our leader!"
113221010.evoFlair_:
"Listen, everyone! From here on, we're going elegantly!"
In response to their master's call, the soldiers push through their predicament and secure an honorable victory.
"A cheer for our leader!"

113221020.baseEffect_: While this follower is in play, allied Levin followers (excluding Jeno, Levin Stalwart) can evolve for 0 evolution points.
113221020.baseFlair_: There's only one thing we need to do: light the fires of courage in our chest to cut through this battlefield!
113221020.evoFlair_: He forcefully swings a steel axe to clear the path. Fighting resolutely in the vanguard, he fills the order members' chests with courage. —Levin Warriors, Chapter 4

114221020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Enhance (6) - Banish an enemy follower or amulet.
114221020.baseFlair_: I have a one-track mind. Once I've set my sights on you, you're as good as done for. Now, now, pretty lady, won't you give me your hand? Feel the kiss of hot lead across your knuckles.
114221020.evoEffect_: Evolve: Destroy an enemy follower with 3 defense or less.
114221020.evoFlair_: Time your breaths the way you would match your steps to the beat of a waltz. Your finger slides over the trigger the way my arm slips around your waist. Oh, don't be afraid. Maybe a little peck on the forehead will comfort you.

115221020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If an allied Commander card is in play, gain the ability to evolve for 0 evolution points.
115221020.baseFlair_:
The shogun is replaced, and the long war is now in the past. At the start of a new era that wishes for eternal peace, antiwar laws are passed.
—Eiwa Era, Year 0: Antiwar Laws
115221020.evoFlair_:
The renouncement of war means that fighting will never take place again. Samurai are unnecessary in a world without war. The shogun orders them to abandon their swords and their names.
—Eiwa Era, Year 1: Peaceful Proclamation

116221020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Recover 1 play point.
Enhance (8): Gain +3/+3 and recover 7 play points instead.
116221020.baseFlair_:
"She moved with great stealth, like a whisper wrapped in night!"
"No matter your secrets, she'll keep the facts hidden!"
"Displays great skill!" "Wild as they come!"
—Satisfied Customers
116221020.evoFlair_:
The soldiers who've adopted steel weaponry are nothing more than a hivemind. Erase the individual and the pack weakens—utter buffoonery. When it comes to warfare, victory goes to those who can best mobilize their talent.
—Beast General

116221030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Enhance (6) - Summon 2 White Tigers and change them into Levin followers.
116221030.baseFlair_:
"I didn't make friends with this beasty till after I joined the order, but I've got her eating out of the palm of my hand now."
"Grrr..."
116221030.evoEffect_: Evolve: Summon a White Tiger and change it into a Levin follower.
116221030.evoFlair_:
"Grrr..."
(She's careless, inattentive, and bad at directions. And she thinks I'm the pet.)

119221010.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, Rally (10): Give your leader the following effect - The next time your leader takes damage, reduce that damage to 0.
119221010.baseFlair_: Captain Lancelot is so strong and cool on every level! All right, Mordred, let's go! Let's see which of us becomes captain of the order first!
119221010.evoEffect_:
Evolve: If there are no allied Mordred, Slumbering Lions in play, summon 1.
At the end of your turn, Rally (10): Give your leader the following effect - The next time your leader takes damage, reduce that damage to 0.
119221010.evoFlair_: I want to become a strong leader of the order someday, just like Captain Lancelot. I'll protect everyone, so they can continue to live in peace and happiness!

119221020.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, Rally (5): Deal 1 damage to all enemy followers.
119221020.baseFlair_: Captain Lancelot is crazy powerful... He's totally on another level. So you want to compete for which of us will become the next captain of the order, Arthur? Bring it on. I won't lose to you!
119221020.evoEffect_:
Evolve: If there are no allied Arthur, Slumbering Dragons in play, summon 1.
At the end of your turn, Rally (5): Deal 1 damage to all enemy followers.
119221020.evoFlair_: I'm going to be a strong leader of the order someday, just like Captain Lancelot. I'll make the world a better place, so that there are no more orphans of war like me and Arthur.

120221010.baseEffect_: Whenever you play a spell, give all allied Swordcraft followers the following effect: Can evolve for 0 evolution points.
120221010.baseFlair_: Somehow I managed to avoid being sent to the front. Phew! I'm just not cut out to be a proper soldier. It's great that my transfer request went through, but um... What do strategists do? Well! I guess I'll just give out orders until I figure it out!
120221010.evoFlair_:
To all troops. The battle plan is: Sleep, eat, nap.
—Fortress Strategist's Encoded Message
So, we're to enter the enemy camp at night and poison their food stores. Then it's nighty-night for them. Got it!
—A Brilliant Messenger Decoding the Plans

121221020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Summon a Knight. If you have more evolution points than your opponent, evolve it. (You have 0 evolution points on turns you are unable to evolve.)
121221020.baseFlair_: Letting go of old grudges is easier said than done. Then again, shouting about the "true moon" or the "false sun" won't change anything—and if there's one thing the Bladerights and Countersolari have in common, it's that we both love this land.
121221020.evoFlair_: Under a bright sun, they dart from one townsperson to the next, helping where they can. Though their job can be thankless, they will strive in the name of restoration. They are the solar light that shines over Isunia—they are the Order of Bladerights.

125221030.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Summon a Knight.
Enhance (4): Then, summon a Steelclad Knight.
Whenever an allied Officer follower comes into play, give it Rush.
125221030.baseFlair_: Finally! I've been dying for some action! All that tension waiting for the right moment—I've gotta let loose! Follow me, Luminous Knights! I'll smash a path clear to victory!
125221030.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
125221030.evoFlair_:
W-wait, Lancer! You can't just rush the enemy forces alone!
—Steeled Luminous Knight
Look at her go. She's like a coiled spring let loose.
—Radiant Luminous Mage

126221030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 2 damage to a random enemy. Do this 1 time. Rally (7): Do this 2 times instead. Rally (15): Do this 3 times instead.
126221030.baseFlair_: Take that, and that, and that! Hurts, doesn't it? Whipping you into shape keeps me in shape. What's this? Perhaps your heart has also become entangled within my grasp?
126221030.evoFlair_: Ahaha, if you're going to face me, you're going to have to approach me! Assuming you can fend off the whiplash, that is!

127221010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Put a Gilded Goblet into your hand. If you've fused or played at least 7 Loot cards this match, put a Dread Pirate's Flag into your hand instead.
Whenever you play a Loot card, deal 1 damage to a random enemy follower and then the enemy leader.
127221010.baseFlair_:
"Anyone who threatens your freedom is an enemy—that's the way of the Pirates of Beltezore!" Dad punished those who deserved it—bad pirates, corrupt politicians, you name it... I hope I can be as cool as him one day.
—Hall of Virtue: Memories of a Convict, Part 3
127221010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
127221010.evoFlair_:
I let the man go because he pleaded for his life, but he attacked me when I wasn't looking... I can't continue being this naive. I have to become stronger... I'm the daughter of Captain Beltezore, after all.
—Hall of Virtue: Memories of a Convict, Part 4

105231010.baseFlair_: I'm off to take a basket of bread and wine to Grandmother. Good thing this nice wolf is helping me through the dark, scary woods. Thank you, wolf!
105231010.evoEffect_: Evolve: Destroy an enemy follower if an allied Neutral follower is in play.
105231010.evoFlair_: Thanks for taking me this far, wolf. Let me say thanks by finishing you off in just a second. Hey, why are you fighting back? You'll just suffer more!

106231010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Put a random Commander card that costs 5 play points or less from your deck into your hand.
Enhance (4): Then put a random Commander card that costs at least 6 play points from your deck into your hand.
106231010.baseFlair_: Even if clouds cover the sky, just behind them the sun is always shining. Fear not the dark clouds. Trust in the light and then I'll give you my strength during battle.
106231010.evoFlair_: Feel the pulsing sun—it will be your strength! I will release my light and disperse the dark clouds that cover the battlefield!

107231020.baseEffect_: Whenever you play a card using its Enhance effect, recover 1 play point.
107231020.baseFlair_: Some have died for this country and some live for it. As the people's ruler, I vow to bring peace to the dead and prosperity to the living.
107231020.evoFlair_: There is both good and evil in this country. I have a great love for it all, and swear to its citizens—until my final day, I will do everything in my power to move us to a brighter tomorrow.

108231010.baseEffect_:
Ambush.
Fanfare: Enhance (8) - Gain +3/+3. Put a Nonja, Silent Maid into your hand and change its cost to 0.
108231010.baseFlair_: I'm the princess. But there's so much I don't know, and my father never lets me leave this castle.
108231010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
108231010.evoFlair_: There's so much I don't know, but someday! Someday I'll be a great leader! And guide everyone in this kingdom!

108231020.baseEffect_:
If this follower can be targeted by enemy effects, your opponent can only target this follower.
Can't be destroyed by effects. (Can be destroyed by damage from effects.)
108231020.baseFlair_: Were I to die, this counthood would go with me. And I'm not about to let that happen. Even if it costs me my humanity, I will live on!
108231020.evoFlair_: I've been special since the day I was born. Not like you rabble! Natural lifespan? Heaven's will? What do those mean to me? All will bend and bow down as I say!

111231010.baseFlair_: My blade is truth. Other people's concept of justice is nothing but lies. We Countersolari are united by our mission. We will fell the false sun and bring new glory to the true moon.
111231010.evoEffect_:
Ambush.
Evolve: Put a Veiled Reckoning into your hand.
111231010.evoFlair_: On that day, when I saw the remains of my once-lively daughter, I renounced rebellion. I can no longer see the moon which once lit my path. I live for vengeance. For the day when I will fell the sun.

115231010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Enhance (5) - Evolve this follower.
Clash: Reduce damage to this follower to 0 until the end of the turn.
115231010.baseFlair_:
There were once samurai in this world, but now only fools remain. They possess no names, no swords. They are no more than lifeless husks who obey the shogun's orders.
—Eiwa Era, Year 58: Wartime Relics
115231010.evoEffect_:
Storm.
Clash: Reduce damage to this follower to 0 until the end of the turn.
While this follower is in play, your leader has the following effect: Reduce damage from effects to 0.
115231010.evoFlair_:
All their training amounts to nothing. Even the children sing songs that mock them. But still they continue to train aimlessly, as though merely fulfilling their duty, whatever that may be.
—Eiwa Era, Year 59: Fool's Wish

116231020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give +0/+1 to an allied Officer follower.
116231020.baseFlair_:
"Any subject deemed rubbish shall be exiled posthaste."
That was the decree His Highness made the day I joined the guard. Though I was the child of a criminal, I knew I'd found my place when I wasn't expelled from the order.
—Royal Guard's Diary
116231020.evoEffect_: Evolve: Give +1/+1 to all Officer followers in your deck.
116231020.evoFlair_:
"You will find no rubbish in this kingdom of mine."
We all erupted into cheers—a true blessing it was, to watch his coronation. His Majesty speaks plainly, but long may he reign.
—Kingdom Knight's Diary

117231020.baseFlair_: When someone draws their weapon, it's only natural that others would draw theirs. Friend or foe, it makes no difference. All it takes is one pull of the trigger. Heehee. Hahahaha! Oh, how I love my job!
117231020.evoEffect_: Evolve: Deal X damage to an enemy follower. X equals the number of allied followers in play.
117231020.evoFlair_: Fear leads to strife, strife becomes gunfire! Peace is a fragile thing, crumbling at the slightest touch. The price of a life can be weighed in bullets. Now come! The waltz of death awaits!

119231010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Skybound Art (10) - Deal 3 damage to the enemy leader.
Super Skybound Art (15): Deal 6 damage instead.
119231010.baseFlair_: To travel far and wide across the skies—how romantic! Please, let me come with you! I want to see the wide world out there. I promise I'll do what I can to spice up your journey! Gozaru!
119231010.evoFlair_: It may not be a main or side dish, but it's an essential part of every dish where I come from. That secret ingredient is... mirin! I promise I'll live up to my name and give your journey the kick it needs! Gozaru!

120231020.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, Rally (7): Deal 2 damage to the enemy leader.
120231020.baseFlair_: "All right crew, weigh anchor! Mrow? We're ready to leave port?" "Yep, the anchor's already weighed, meow!" "Myahaha, you're holding it in your paws right now, Cap'n!" "Nrgh, be quiet, mreow! SS Meowser, full speed ahead!" —Cat Admiral and Her Merry Crew
120231020.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Summon a Shield Guardian and Heavy Knight.
At the end of your turn, Rally (7): Deal 2 damage to the enemy leader.
120231020.evoFlair_: "I see the pirates, meow! Crew— Mrow? The enemy's in disarray!" "That's because you threw the anchor at them, meow!" "They’re sinking, mrowr!" "Great! Ram them on my signal, meow! Let's hope for their sake those rats can swim!" —Cat Admiral and Her Merry Crew

122231010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: If any allied Commander cards are in play, gain Rush and the following effect - The next time this follower takes damage, reduce that damage to 0.
Fanfare: If any evolved allied followers are in play, evolve this follower.
122231010.baseFlair_:
Eye on the prize! Keep on tryin' out new things—something's bound to happen sooner or later, am I right?
—Kazuki Shindo
122231010.evoFlair_:
The best defense is a good offense, ya know? I mean, if you just keep on attacking, they'll run out of defense eventually.
—Kazuki Shindo

123231020.baseEffect_:
Ambush.
Fanfare: Put a Gilded Necklace into your hand. Rally (15): If your opponent has at least 1 evolution point, use 1 of them and recover 1 evolution point. (You have 0 evolution points on turns you are unable to evolve.)

I've claimed the kingdom's most prized jewel, the "Desert Dewdrop."
—Arsène Lupin
123231020.evoEffect_:
Ambush.
Clash: Remove all effects on the enemy follower except changes to its attack or defense. Draw a card.
123231020.evoFlair_:
This jewel once belonged to your mother. She would have wanted you to have it. Happy Birthday.
Sincerely,
A friend

125231010.baseFlair_: Stop gawkin' and start fighting! Get a move on—and you better not blink, unless you want your face pounded ten times before you hit the ground!
125231010.evoEffect_:
Storm.
Can attack 2 times per turn.
125231010.evoFlair_: Sorry, am I too fast to keep up with? I can't help running rings around you—I've seen molasses move faster! Better keep up, if you want to make it outta here in one piece!

125231020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to an enemy follower and then the enemy leader. If at least 5 other allied Commander cards have come into play this match, deal 3 damage instead and evolve this follower.
125231020.baseFlair_: Brand the name of our order into your heart! So long as darkness pervades the land, we will be the blades that usher in the dawn! Continue your advance, Luminous Knights!
125231020.evoFlair_:
Aww, yes! Come at me with all you've got! I'll knock you clear into next week!
—Luminous Lancer
No matter what you throw at us, we will not halt!
—Lyrala, Luminous Cleric

900231080.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Last Words: Put an Azord, Duke of the Mists without Accelerate into your hand.
900231080.baseFlair_: Welcome to Lord Azord's manor. I am Lilje, a butler in service to Lord Azord. Now then, prepare for battle. I will determine whether you are worthy of my lord deigning to duel you.
900231080.evoFlair_: Well, well. Your skill is tremendous. So tremendous, in fact, that my forgotten ambition has been reawakened. I have changed my mind. Regretfully, you will not be fighting against my lord. Why, you ask? I will not be letting you go until I have had my fill of fun.

900231090.baseEffect_:
Bane.
Last Words: Put an Azord, Duke of the Mists without Accelerate into your hand.
900231090.baseFlair_: Welcome to Lord Azord's manor. I am Sheena, a maid in service to Lord Azord. Now then, prepare for battle. I will determine whether you are worthy of my lord deigning to duel you.
900231090.evoFlair_: Hm. I see. I have a grasp of your skill level now. I am pleased to inform you that you passed the test. I will lead you to Lord Azord. I will be sure to tell him that you are worthy of his full power.

900231110.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a random Levin follower from your deck into your hand.
900231110.baseFlair_: I'm Mina, vice leader of the Sky Knights! One of my duties is to give guidance to the other members. Don't be shy—Ask for a hand any time you need it!
900231110.evoFlair_: She's a cornerstone of the Sky Knights, as reliable as they come. Though once in a while, she can be a little rigid. —Albert, Levin Champion

108241010.baseEffect_: If you have at least 5 play points, Choose: Play this card as a Celia, Hope's Strategist or Celia, Despair's Messenger.
108241010.baseFlair_: With me in charge there can be no question of the outcome. Each and every one of us will return home safely. Now let us begin!
108241010.evoFlair_: It's a great honor to command this air brigade. Watch here now as I invoke the undefeated legacy of Captain Walfrid!

124241010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Hero of the Hunt into your hand. Rally (10): Recover 1 evolution point.
124241010.baseFlair_:
The Aconite Paladin—a knight in full bloom, as handsome as he is hardy. The guests cannot help but admire him! Something about his laugh is infectious.
"Keh! Let's get this party started!"
124241010.evoEffect_: Evolve: Subtract 2 from the cost of a random Hero of the Hunt in your hand.
124241010.evoFlair_:
Taketsumi? Yup, everybody loves him! He's super cool and tough, but also he's really friendly. He makes even the scariest sootspawn attacks fun! Arooo!
—Itsurugi, Eager Admirer

128241030.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: Rally (5) - Draw a card.
Rally (10): Evolve this follower.
Rally (15): Gain Storm.
Rally (20): Gain Bane, Ward, and the following effect - The next time this follower takes damage, reduce that damage to 0.
128241030.baseFlair_: Advantage gives way to success. Success to victory. Victory... to glory. And yet, that glory also rides on the backs of my enemies' defeats. Even so, I must bear the weight of their dreams, and forge the way forward to my own.
128241030.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
128241030.evoFlair_: Rejoice, my brethren! Cower, my foes! By Galatyn, blade of the heavens, dawn shall break over this battlefield! Glory be to the king!

110214010.baseEffect_:
Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower.
Randomly put 1 of the following cards into your hand.
-Gilded Blade
-Gilded Goblet
-Gilded Boots
-Gilded Necklace
110214010.baseFlair_: Go ahead, hunger. Once the craving overtakes you, claim what is rightfully yours. That is the true way of the world, after all.

111214010.baseEffect_: Give +0/+1, Rush, and Bane to an allied follower.
111214010.baseFlair_: The pipes which heralded the war's opening salvos now play a lilting song of victory.

708214010.baseEffect_: Give +0/+1, Rush, and Bane to an allied follower.
708214010.baseFlair_: Looks like I only needed to distract you.

114214010.baseFlair_:
1. Make the proper hand seals in order.
2. Divide your consciousness between all your clones.
3. Try not to squabble with them.
—Mirror Image Scroll

124214010.baseEffect_:

124214010.baseFlair_: In a battle of commerce, a honeyed tongue is the weapon of choice.

717214010.baseEffect_:
Draw a card and subtract 1 from its cost.
Put a Gilded Boots into your hand.

Destroy an enemy follower.
If Ambush is active for any allied followers in play, banish the enemy follower instead.

127214010.baseEffect_:
Deal 2 damage to a random enemy follower. Do this 1 time. Draw a card.
Rally (10): Do this 2 times and draw 2 cards instead.
127214010.baseFlair_:
Oh yeah, that ninja move is great. "Throw-every-possible-ninja-weapon-you-can-think-of-
and-hope-something-hits jutsu," we used to call it! Everyone uses it when they start out, don't sweat it.
—Kunoichi Trainee

Put a random Officer card from your deck into your hand.

Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower.
If Ambush is active for any allied followers in play, deal 6 damage instead.
105224010.baseFlair_: Smear the pulverized dragon scales and a single hair from a spiny desert lizard, and then leave them overnight. Enchant the mixture the following morning, and then ignite. —Book of Flame, Treatise on Arcane Ninjutsu

106224010.baseEffect_: Give an allied follower +0/+2 and the following effect: Can't be targeted by enemy effects.
106224010.baseFlair_: Armor forged from a fallen fragment of a distant star, its shine isn't typical of regular iron. Instead it twinkles with the splendor of the heavens.

112224010.baseEffect_:

112224010.baseFlair_: Flowers in the wild blossom beneath peace and sunlight. Flowers on the battlefield bloom atop triumph and glory.

709224010.baseEffect_:
Deal 1 damage to a random enemy follower. Do this X times (up to 10 times). X equals the attack of the strongest allied follower in play.
Enhance (5): Before dealing damage, give +2/+2 to an allied follower.
709224010.baseFlair_: I'll give it everything I've got! Watch as I cut 'em to pieces—Princess Strike!

117224010.baseEffect_:
Summon a Shield Guardian and Knight.
Rally (15): Summon a Frontguard General instead of a Shield Guardian.
117224010.baseFlair_: Stand firm against the enemy. On our pride as noble knights, none shall pass so long as we draw breath.

119224010.baseEffect_: Put a random Officer follower from your deck into your hand and give it +2/+2.
119224010.baseFlair_:
There's no shortcut to getting stronger. The key to victory is hard work and honest sweat, that's all there is to it. Now quit slacking off and get back to your training!
—Weathered Vanguard

Hedgehog-gnawed blade: Evean Plains, 131 years old.
Floral fencer's hair ornament: Fort Osborne, 96 years old.
Traveling frog’s ephemera: Side of a random road, provenance unknown.

Restore 3 defense to your leader.

121224010.baseFlair_: "New glory for the true moon." He would live up to that creed, not out of selfless devotion, but for his daughter. Even should he become an enemy of his nation, of the people, he would do anything to keep his daughter's warm hand in his. —Tales from Isunia, Entry 2

900224040.baseEffect_: Give an unevolved allied follower the ability to evolve for 0 evolution points.
900224040.baseFlair_:
You cowards who fear the flame will freeze by my spear.
—Otus of the Aloadae

Enhance (5): Draw 3 cards instead.

900234030.baseFlair_: I wouldn't look down upon me if I were you. I'm quite capable with the blade, you see.

900244050.baseFlair_: Hollowness incites usurpation. People steal other's lives and possessions to fill the void inside them. And once you know the sated feeling of "having," the gnawing threat of loss is all the more... inspiring.

Fear my dance, O monstrous arachnid—
For with a single swing, thou art lost.

101222010.baseEffect_: Whenever an allied Commander card comes into play, summon a Heavy Knight.

109223010.baseFlair_: Love. The poets sing of it in words, but warriors show it with their blades. The nobility indulge upon it like wine, but the warrior protects it with shields. —War, Chapter 1

Countdown (1)
Fanfare: Give an allied Swordcraft follower +0/+1.

900223010.baseFlair_: Protect love with that shield, and grasp your hands around tomorrow. —War, Chapter 2

900223020.baseEffect_:
Countdown (1)
Fanfare: Give an allied Swordcraft follower +1/+0.
Last Words: Summon a Heavy Knight.
900223020.baseFlair_: Forge your blade with love, and cut a path to tomorrow. —War, Chapter 3

100211030.baseFlair_: Think nothing of my swordsmanship. Pay no heed to my armor. But malign those whom I call friends at your peril.
100211030.evoFlair_: Safety is found in solidarity, and from it is born unparalleled power. Yes, comradeship trumps all, and I am living proof of it.

101211060.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give +1/+1 to an allied Officer follower.
101211060.baseFlair_: No, no, no! You dare to call yourself a knight of the realm with posture like that? Stand firm and advance like you mean it!
101211060.evoFlair_: Ever felt the steely tip of a rapier piercing your breast? Keep slacking off and you shall!

101211090.baseFlair_: Fly my steed! The battlefield awaits!
101211090.evoFlair_: Fear itself cowers at the sight of me and my mighty steed!

101211100.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Gain +1/+1 if an allied Commander card is in play.
101211100.baseFlair_: Have no fear, Master. Intruders shall soon be trimmed down to size. It'll only take two snips.
101211100.evoFlair_: Our roses are nourished with the fresh blood of intruders. Little wonder they are such a brilliant scarlet color.

102211010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Gain +1/+0 and Ambush if an evolved allied follower is in play.
102211010.baseFlair_: Silently I'll strike, and my blade will be your grave marker.
102211010.evoFlair_: You'll never hear me coming. An attack from me is a better going away present than you deserve.

103211030.baseFlair_: So all I gotta do is demolish the fortress? As you wish, commander! I'll be back in a jiffy!
103211030.evoFlair_: There's no need to worry, regardless of how tough the fighting gets. I'll just bring back the head of the enemy general! Problem solved!

103211060.baseFlair_: Whoa now, watch where you're going. It's like you're begging to get robbed.
103211060.evoFlair_: Whoa now, watch where you're going. This time you only lost your wallet, but next time it'll be your life!

104211040.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, gain Ambush.
104211040.baseFlair_: Looking like this, I've never been one for attention. Hiding is a specialty of mine—whether it's in darkness, the shade of a tree, or a convenient crowd.
104211040.evoFlair_: I'm not a human, and I'm not a frog. So what am I then? I don't know, and that's why I go from place to place—wherever the wind and my whims take me.

105211030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Draw X cards. X equals the number of allied Neutral cards in play.
105211030.baseFlair_: You over there, and you over there! Everyone, hurry up! If we delay the banquet, the queen will lop off our heads!
105211030.evoFlair_: After a lot of hopping around, we finally got this place in order. Hurry on to the next task or the queen will lop off our heads!

106211010.baseEffect_: Clash: Deal 1 damage to the enemy follower.
106211010.baseFlair_: This is the flail of destruction. It pierces the wind like a meteorite and incinerates everything in its path!
106211010.evoFlair_: This is the flail of devotion. This technique was passed down to me from my late father—get a taste of it!

107211020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Give +1/+0 to an allied Officer follower.
Enhance (7): Give +3/+2 instead.
107211020.baseFlair_: Oh, a customer? I'll give you a discount—take a look at this merch!
107211020.evoFlair_: I've got all kinds of bargains for you! Remember, the customer's always right! If they can pay, of course.

108211020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Enhance (6) - Gain +2/+2. Can attack 2 times per turn.
108211020.baseFlair_: The war field is a monster that feeds on life. If you can't cut down one old man, then you have no right to stand here. Let me see you transcend my two blades, youngblood!
108211020.evoFlair_: What can be learned from the blade, the blade will teach you. This is the way of the war field. Contend with me, youngblood, or my two blades will fell you!

109211010.baseFlair_: Who are you? Having someone else here complicates things. Sorry, but I need you to disappear.
109211010.evoFlair_: I'm sorry I jumped to conclusions. And, um, about earlier... I actually meant that you should run away. I'm, uh, not great with words...

110211020.baseFlair_: I've got no name for meself, no title to claim. But even though me hair's gone white, I'm still a frontline soldier. Easy too, when yer sword arm's strong as mine. You young green swords, you'd better follow me on the battlefield.
110211020.evoFlair_: You don't come back from a bunch o' wars without dodgin' ol' death more than yer fair share. Now that me beard's gone white, I'm a silver wolf on the front lines. Easy too, when your bite is bigger than your bark. You young green swords, you'd better follow me lead.

111211010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Enhance (6) - Deal 3 damage to the enemy leader.
111211010.baseFlair_: This fella was abandoned. I taught 'im to fight for survival. Watch out—it really hurts when he sinks his teeth into ya. —Adoptive Guardian
111211010.evoFlair_: He's an even better soldier'n me, now. If you meet him on the battlefield, look sharp. He eats new recruits for breakfast. —Adoptive Guardian

112211030.baseFlair_: This world is a sea of carnage, a never-ending hell. Though the path I travel may be littered with corpses, I wouldn't have it any other way. Killing is simply necessary for survival.
112211030.evoFlair_: Protecting the innocent is an arduous task. I have cut short the lives of beasts and humans alike, but... raising an orphaned child is no simple feat. They can be taken from you in an instant, but protecting them is a lifelong commitment.

113211030.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Gain Ambush until the end of your opponent's turn.
Enhance (6): Gain +2/+2.
113211030.baseFlair_: It's nice going from A to B, but you've got to love the scenic route. The wind's as free a thing as you'll find. It just flutters to and fro then drifts on by. What do you say we take it as easy as the breeze?
113211030.evoEffect_: At the end of your turn, gain Ambush.
113211030.evoFlair_: A wayfarer rescued the captive princess. He was neither human nor frog—and he simply viewed himself as a knight. Hiding himself skillfully, this covert knight lays waste to the wicked. —A Traveler in Search of Self

114211010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Choose - Put a Gilded Boots or Gilded Necklace into your hand.
114211010.baseFlair_: An eye for an eye? Hah! Try a thief for a thief! No hard feelings, pal—I'm just here to do a job. You'll be giving back the royal treasure one way or another!
114211010.evoFlair_: It takes a thief to catch a thief! Whew, it sure is nice to be the good guy once in a while. I'll take gratitude and praise in place of treasure... this time.

115211030.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: If an allied Naterran Great Tree is in play, recover 1 play point.
When this follower's attack or defense is increased by an effect, gain Storm.
115211030.baseFlair_:
"He can spring on his prey from a tremendous distance!"
"His tactics allow him to pierce the gap, making his enemy an easy mark!"
"Show them how a wild beast fights!"
—Group of warrior admirers
115211030.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
115211030.evoFlair_:
"He can spring upon his prey from a tremendous distance!"
"His legs don't stop moving until his target falls!"
"Seize victory with the power of the wilds!"
—Group of warrior admirers

116211020.baseFlair_: These streets are my cloak. Duck into an alleyway, and you can get the drop on any mark. There's no escape—not on my turf.
116211020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
116211020.evoFlair_: Rumors, footprints, lines of sight. Even without a tongue, the streets still talk. Listen close enough, and they'll tell you how to find any mark. But it's not me that pays for 'em to die—it's the streets.

118211010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Give +1/+1 to an allied Officer follower.
Rally (10): Give +1/+1 to all allied Officer followers instead.
118211010.baseFlair_: A thousand practice swings and then a thousand more in training matches—today. If you can't handle that, then don't bother going to the front lines. A soldier without training is a monkey without a tail.
118211010.evoFlair_: Losing so many recruits in my early days as an instructor made me realize that proper and adequate training is paramount to survival. But you've all proven your worth! I declare you fit for battle!

119211020.baseEffect_:
Storm.
Last Words: Summon a Bullet Bike.
119211020.baseFlair_: Well, well, let's see who my next victim is going to be. You there! Sorry to be the bearer of bad news, but luck is not on your side today. Your money or your life!
119211020.evoFlair_: You made a wise choice. Hm, so this is how much you think your life is worth, eh? Here's my counteroffer!

123211010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Randomly put 1 of the following cards into your hand and recover 1 play point.
-Gilded Blade
-Gilded Goblet
-Gilded Boots
-Gilded Necklace
Rally (7): Randomly put 2 different ones into your hand and recover 2 play points instead.
123211010.baseFlair_: Take what's yours; steal what isn't. None of that "only from the rich" crap. Don't ever let them or yourself get complacent—there's always more to usurp.
123211010.evoFlair_: The Ten Omens were bestowed upon the world on a tablet of sapphire stone. Upon the trials' completion, the stone crumbled, but devoted disciples of usurpation continued to shun complacency for a life on the run.

127211030.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Enhance (5) - Gain +2/+2. Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower and then the enemy leader.
127211030.baseFlair_:
What? You think that over-encumbered fool looks like a strong warrior? If you ask me, he wears all that armor because deep down—beneath all those layers of solid metal—he has the heart of a coward who fears pain.
—A Teacher Observing His Former Pupil
127211030.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
127211030.evoFlair_:
What one should truly fear isn't pain to one's body, but the pain felt by one's comrades in battle. To become truly strong, he must first confront his craven heart and throw aside the armor he hides behind.
—A Teacher Observing His Former Pupil

900211040.baseFlair_: Arr, I've always been a wrong'un, but the cap'n welcomed me with open arms! I'll never forget what he did for me. I'll give my life to protect him!
900211040.evoFlair_: Arrr harrr! Do yer worst! As long there's still life in me bones, I won't let any of ye go near the cap'n. If ye want to get to him, ye'll need to get past me first!

900211050.baseFlair_: Harrr! I was here first! I won't let ye jump the queue and pinch me prey!
900211050.evoFlair_: Take all ye like an' give nothing back! That's how it is on the high seas! Well? Are ye starting to see how proud we Vikings are?

900211060.baseFlair_: I will not allow this fortress to fall! I must hold out until backup arrives!
900211060.evoFlair_: There are injured soldiers inside the fortress, so I must not abandon my post no matter how difficult it be! Any enemies who enter will do so over my dead body!

101221050.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give Ward to all allied Officer followers.
101221050.baseFlair_: There can be no higher calling than bringing order to the high seas. Unfettered freedom across the seas is only possible when order reigns supreme.
101221050.evoFlair_: When facing the nefarious pirates, spare not the rod of justice, as cruel and harsh as it may be. Peace must be maintained! Now hoist our colors, so that all may know who rules these waves!

101221070.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a random 1-play-point follower from your deck into play.
101221070.baseFlair_: I am the princess who governs this kingdom, and you are my humble servant! Now, go! Bring me the heads of those who dare to cross me!
101221070.evoFlair_: I am an impartial ruler: gods and men alike shall fear me equally! Now sing for me, humble servant! Sing a requiem for those about to die! A-ha-ha-ha!

102221020.baseEffect_:
Bane.
Fanfare: Gain Storm if an allied Commander card is in play.
102221020.baseFlair_: Just give the order, and the target will be disposed of immediately.
102221020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
102221020.evoFlair_: There's always dirty work to do. Luckily, I don't mind getting a little blood on my hands.

105221010.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Clash: Gain Bane until the end of the turn if the enemy follower has at least 5 attack.
105221010.baseFlair_: My dream is to be a great ogre hunter like Papa and Mama!
105221010.evoFlair_: Don't let your guard down because I'm a cute little girl. After all, I wield the Ogreslayer!

105221020.baseFlair_: Once upon a time there lived a little old woman and a little old man. The old man hunted ogres in the mountains, and the old woman washed the ogre hides in the river.
105221020.evoEffect_:
Bane.
Can attack 2 times per turn.
105221020.evoFlair_: They would make jerky from the flesh, a healing powder from the bones, and satchels from the washed hide. The old man and the old woman only grew closer as they aged. Chasing after ogres, they lived happily ever after.

106221020.baseEffect_:
Whenever you play a Commander card that originally costs 3 play points, if this card costs 3 play points, change this card's cost to 2 until the end of the turn.
----------
Storm.
106221020.baseFlair_: An unforgivable deed, an unrighteous encounter. Rescued by her adversary, the general, this maiden's passions burst into violent flame. Alas, love is but a sweet poison—a poison that once swallowed, drags the drinker to the depths of Hades.
106221020.evoFlair_: Even if the heart were to allow it, a thousand soldiers would stand in the way. Their encounter was too late to be tragedy, too brutal to be farce. Alas, this dignified maiden holds her sword and howls to close out the final act.

106221030.baseEffect_:
Whenever you play a Commander card that originally costs 3 play points, if this card costs 3 play points, change this card's cost to 2 until the end of the turn.
----------
Ward.
106221030.baseFlair_: An unforgivable deed, an unrighteous encounter. The tears of his adversary, the maiden, quietly extinguish this general's passions. Alas, love is but a sweet poison—a poison that once swallowed, drags the drinker into unavoidable despair.
106221030.evoFlair_: Even if the heart were to allow it, a thousand deeds would stand in the way. Their distance was too great to be tragedy, too brutal to be farce. Alas, this raging general holds his sword and howls to close out the final act.

108221010.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Gain Bane if an allied Commander card is in play.
108221010.baseFlair_: It doesn't matter who you might be. There's a line you cross when you hurt our gorgeous Princess Prim. Stand down, or I'll be forced to take you on.
108221010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
108221010.evoFlair_: Princess Prim's gentle beauty knows no limits. All her splendor's making me... Ah, my nose is bleeding!

108221030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Choose - Put a Holy Purebomb or Fatal Spellbomb into your hand.
108221030.baseFlair_: Licking your lips at people's kindness and then rending it to pieces... Haven't you had enough fun? Let me put you to sleep nice and easy.
108221030.evoFlair_: When everything you do's bad, you're bound to attract some shady characters—yeah, ones like me who kill for gold. Now kiss the dirt!

109221010.baseFlair_: Charlotta, here to bring evil to justice! Allow me to prove why I was appointed captain of the Lumiel Order of Holy Knights!
109221010.evoEffect_:
Ward.
Evolve: Give all allied followers the following effect until the end of the opponent's turn - Reduce damage from effects to 0.
109221010.evoFlair_: Haha! Had enough yet? I must say you've made for a most disappointing opponent! What was that you said? What do you mean, pretty good for a little girl! I'll have you know I'm a full-fledged grown-up!

110221020.baseFlair_: When I was a kid, I found a treasure map in a garbage dump. Turned out to be a fake someone had drawn for fun, but it was enough to shake me loose from my narrow little world... to show me what was worth risking my life for! —Autobiography of an Unknown Pirate
110221020.evoFlair_:
That fake map said the treasure lay beyond an unknown ocean. So I grew up, became a pirate, and reached that very place: An empty land of perfect freedom. In a way, the map was more genuine than its maker knew!
—Autobiography of an Unknown Pirate

110221030.baseEffect_:
Ambush.
Strike: Randomly put 1 of the following cards into your hand.
-Gilded Blade
-Gilded Goblet
-Gilded Boots
-Gilded Necklace
Whenever you play a Loot card, gain +0/+1.
110221030.baseFlair_: Take and take again. Satiate your cravings; devour the rich and the fat, the poor and the meager. Seize everything, leave nothing.
110221030.evoFlair_:
The Second Step: Thirst
The self is a desert—an endless, hollow expanse. And just as the body naturally thirsts in such unforgiving barrens, so too does the soul. Remember this.
—Teachings of the Usurping Thief

111221020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Discard a card from your hand. Put a random spell or amulet from your deck into your hand.
111221020.baseFlair_: Ah, the battlefield. I smell customers! A beautiful bowgun for you, this handsome lance for you... There! Now get to killing each other! This is what I live for!
111221020.evoFlair_: I love the smell of the battlefield in the morning! And once I've sold out my wares, the real fun can begin. Soldiers sniping each other. Kids being stabbed in the back. Young men's heads flying through the air. Heehee. Hahahaha! Come! Let's dance!

116221010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: If an allied Commander card is in play, gain Rush.
Last Words: At the start of your next turn, put a random Commander card from your deck into your hand.
116221010.baseFlair_: The silver streak he follows is dazzling and beautiful, giving him the strength and passion to charge forward. He turns to the rest of his gallant fellows, his role as vice captain clear in his tone as he belts, "You either give everything or you're worth nothing!"
116221010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
116221010.evoFlair_:
"Gelt, the other knights and I, we all rely on you so much."
—Amelia, the Silverflash
"Stop that, Amelia. You'll make me blush!"
—Gelt, Resolute Knight

117221010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Summon a Shield Guardian.
Enhance (5): Summon 3 instead.
Enhance (10): Give +3/+3 to all allied Shield Guardians.
117221010.baseFlair_: She is The Empress, patron of motherhood. Nothing brings her greater joy than to nurture those under her care and see them grow. For it is children raised in benevolence who in turn shelter others from the unkindness of the world.
117221010.evoFlair_: She is the giver of life, drawing her children to her merciful bosom. Turning her gaze to the cradle that is the battlefield, she knows that children rocked by true hardship grow into adults that thrive even in the harshest of places.

118221010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Rally (5) - Choose: Summon a Bullet Bike or Arcane Personnel Carrier.
118221010.baseFlair_:
WANTED: OUTLAW GUNNER
Bounty: 10,000 gold
Offenses: Theft, smuggling, etc.
Notes: Seen frequenting the watering hole
118221010.evoFlair_:
WANTED: OUTLAW GUNNER
Dead or alive. Information that leads to stolen articles will be rewarded.
Streetwise and evasive.
Misses all her shots.

121221010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Discard a card from your hand. Draw a card. If the discarded card was an amulet, draw 2 instead.
121221010.baseFlair_: Another busy day for the Association. We've got a shipment ready for a certain nation in the west and a rebel army in the east needs wares to hold down a village. Of course, we mustn't forget the pocket change to make sure none of these transactions are on the books!
121221010.evoEffect_: Evolve: Deal 5 damage to an enemy follower.
121221010.evoFlair_: Magnificent. You truly are a shining example of a Valhorean Association merchant. Selling weapons at cut-rate prices has created fertile ground for the seeds of war to grow. See for yourself—a profusion of fiery blooms as far as the eye can see. —Alyaska, War Hawker

715221020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Discard a card from your hand. Draw a card. If the discarded card was an amulet, draw 2 instead.
715221020.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Deal 5 damage to an enemy follower.

(This card will be treated as a Valhorean Dealer.)
715221020.evoFlair_:
"Shall we try drawing out the full power of my soul?"
"Sounds good to me. Let's do it, Amidamaru!"
—Yoh Asakura and Amidamaru

122221020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Enhance (5) - Deal 2 damage to 2 enemy followers. Draw 2 cards.
122221020.baseFlair_: Well met, and listen well, so-called "boyfriend." What makes a nobleman a nobleman? Why, pride, of course! And on my very own pride as a nobleman, I assure you this blade shan't miss its target.
122221020.evoFlair_: Absolutely preposterous! Unfathomable! You wish to take my daughter's hand in courtship? You'll have to go through me first!

124221010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Put a Glittering Gold into your hand. Then, if at least 3 Glittering Golds have been added to your hand this match, gain Storm.
Whenever you play a Glittering Gold, deal 3 damage to a random enemy follower.
124221010.baseFlair_:
Thank you for the applause, sir. Remember to take the time to treat yourself to some soothing tunes, because you deserve the luxury. Oh? You're passing through the inn on business, you say?
—Inn on the Outskirts of Town, Day 2
124221010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
124221010.evoFlair_:
Ahaha. Finally, a "guest" who knew the secret phrase. Wouldn'ta guessed him to be on this side of the law, but he knew to give me the code on his second day, which means... we've got ourselves a real client!
—Musings of "Silverclaw"

717221010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Put a Glittering Gold into your hand. Then, if at least 3 Glittering Golds have been added to your hand this match, gain Storm.
Whenever you play a Glittering Gold, deal 3 damage to a random enemy follower.
717221010.baseFlair_:
Thank you for the applause, sir. Remember to take the time to treat yourself to some soothing tunes, because you deserve the luxury. Oh? You're passing through the inn on business, you say?
—Inn on the Outskirts of Town, Day 2
717221010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
717221010.evoFlair_:
Ahaha. Finally, a "guest" who knew the secret phrase. Wouldn'ta guessed him to be on this side of the law, but he knew to give me the code on his second day, which means... we've got ourselves a real client!
—Musings of "Silverclaw"

125221020.baseEffect_: While this follower is in play, allied Commander followers can evolve for 0 evolution points.
125221020.baseFlair_: We discarded the remnants of our past to put an end to this lightless age. We now wear the mantle of the Luminous Knights, and we will be the dawn shining upon the new era.
125221020.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Put a random Commander card that costs 2 play points or less from your deck into your hand and change its cost to 0 until the end of the turn.
While this follower is in play, allied Commander followers can evolve for 0 evolution points.
125221020.evoFlair_:
We'll deliver the light of hope unto the people!
—Lyrala, Luminous Cleric
Get your staff ready! I'm probably gonna need some healing after I smash through their defenses!
—Luminous Lancer

127221020.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Gain the following effect - Can't take more than 1 damage at a time.
127221020.baseFlair_:
It might be impossible to be together forever... but we can at least still be friends! It's not pointless to try and make connections with others!
—Ren Kazamatsuri
127221020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
127221020.evoFlair_:
Even if we have to go our separate ways one day... the bonds we have will never break!
—Ren Kazamatsuri

128221010.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Rally (10) - Destroy an enemy follower and then deal 3 damage to the enemy leader.
128221010.baseFlair_:
The princeling gagged as he entered the shooting range, where a cauldron of pungent hawkeye potion awaited any who missed a shot. The princeling quietly steeled himself, for he now knew failure was ever more bitter.
—The Striped Prince of Légen, Chapter 2
128221010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
128221010.evoFlair_: Let me explain how grades work here. Hit all the targets for a C. Hit all the targets with a bullseye for a B. Hit the Striped Knight statue across town for an A. Anything else will be considered a failure. Heh... You polliwogs'll get used it.

101231030.baseFlair_: As this realm's protector I do vow: no foe shall step foot on this, our sovereign land, as long as I may stand!
101231030.evoEffect_: Evolve: Give an allied Officer follower +2/+2.
101231030.evoFlair_: Bend the knee, and gaze upon these jewels. Where once there knelt meekness now stands pure brutality! Yes, this realm will see you turned to heroes today!

102231010.baseFlair_: As white paladins, we have sworn an oath to serve the gods and protect the mistress. We shall answer any threats to her with our steel.
102231010.evoEffect_:
Ward.
Evolve: Summon a Shield Guardian for each enemy follower in play.
102231010.evoFlair_: As long as we stand, none shall touch the mistress. We shall defend her to the last, with our lives if necessary.

104231020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Give all allied Officer followers the following effects until this follower leaves play.
-Can't be destroyed by effects.
-Reduce damage from effects to 0.
104231020.baseFlair_: Give up? Never! I'll be the guardian who protects you all.
104231020.evoFlair_: My dad's reputation... my pride... I don't care about that stuff anymore. I'm not going to let anyone hurt my friends!

107231010.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Gain Strike: Deal 2 damage to all enemy followers.
107231010.baseFlair_: At the speed of lightning, I am one with the tempest. I won't be caught by the likes of you!
107231010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
107231010.evoFlair_: With the fury of a raging storm, I'll leave no trace behind. This whirlwind will tear you apart!

112231020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: If you have at least 2 other Officer cards in your hand, gain Rush.
Fanfare: If you have at least 2 other Commander cards in your hand, gain +1/+1.
112231020.baseFlair_: I'd be lying if I said I wasn't lonely. But I have my reasons. I've been tainted by the sinful duty I was given, and as such I have no right to get close to anyone. Eep! U-um... It freaks me out when you get close like that all of a sudden!
112231020.evoEffect_: Evolve: Deal X damage to an enemy follower. X equals the number of Commander cards in your hand.
112231020.evoFlair_: The Thunder of Hagelberg... Even now I am unable to escape my ill reputation. But still, I—Eep! I told you, I'm tainted! A-and either way, it's embarrassing being so close to someone! Wahhh!

113231010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If you have at least 2 other Machina cards in your hand, gain +2/+2.
113231010.baseFlair_: Core mutations have led to one new breakthrough after another. If Stampeding Fortress is a weapon best suited to group combat, this blade is one that's fit for cutting down individuals. —War Chieftain's Report
113231010.evoEffect_: Evolve: If another allied Machina follower is in play, destroy an enemy follower.
113231010.evoFlair_: This gorgeous fortress is as flashy as they come, but nowadays martial prowess isn't everything—information's an important element in the mix. But don't you think this job's a little boring? —Autoblade Patroller to Stampeding Fortress

116231010.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: If you have at least 2 Commander cards in your hand, gain Bane and the following effect - The next time this follower takes damage, reduce that damage to 0.
Fanfare: Enhance (8) - Gain Storm. Recover 5 play points.
116231010.baseFlair_: How do you do, my little students of war? The commander's given me the responsibility of teaching you today's stratagem. And it's going to feel great... learning from me.
116231010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
116231010.evoFlair_:
All units, divide and conquer. Follow the given route and press the advantage.
—Commanding Officer, relaying orders
Sir, yes sir. I'll stab the kinks right out of them.
—Lady of the Lance, beautifully obeying

119231030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal X damage to all enemy followers. X equals this follower's attack. Then, put a random Commander card from your deck into your hand.
119231030.baseFlair_: Thank you for making time to see me, General. I know you must be busy, so I'll make this brief. My lord sent me to deliver a token of his esteem. Please accept it with his compliments.
119231030.evoFlair_: You did well to dodge my sneak attack. This reminds me of the good old days, when I'd exchange many a general's head for badges of honor. But I march under a different set of orders now. Well, shall we drop the niceties and get started?

126231020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a random card with Enhance from your deck into your hand.
