126231020.baseFlair_: There's always room for a bit of magical flair when administrating justice to the bad guys! We could use it to infiltrate that locked room, or perhaps save it for our epic getaway once we grab the eviden—hey, hey, hey, what did I say about raising your voice during a heist?
126231020.evoFlair_: Many tools are available in this line of work, and it all depends on how you use them. And look, I can do a little bit of magic, so why not use it? I owe a lot to a certain person, and I'm going to do everything I can to make sure justice is served in their name!

127231010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Put a Gilded Necklace into your hand. If you've fused or played at least 7 Loot cards this match, put a Dread Pirate's Flag into your hand instead.
Whenever you play a Loot card, summon a Marine Raider.
127231010.baseFlair_:
Dad's too soft. Why can't we kill evil people? Or steal for a just reason? It's so inefficient, and obsolete... like this ship. I can't do anything I want. There's no freedom to be had here.
—Hall of Virtue: Memories of a Convict, Part 5
127231010.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Subtract 1 from the cost of a Loot card in your hand.
Whenever you play a Loot card, summon a Cannoneer.
127231010.evoFlair_:
If we kill our enemies, they won't come back for revenge. If we steal from the people, we can offset our losses. The results speak for themselves. The real thief was my father—for trying to take away my freedom!
—Hall of Virtue: Memories of a Convict, Part 6

127231030.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Whenever an allied Officer follower comes into play, give it Storm.
127231030.baseFlair_:
So you came. I'm impressed you didn't chicken out. Devious as you are, I can give you that much credit, Seventh Flame!
—Tatsumi Raido
127231030.evoEffect_:
Ward.
Evolve: Summon 2 Knights.
Whenever an allied Officer follower comes into play, give it Storm.
127231030.evoFlair_:
Heh. Do you know what makes Swordcraft special? The way Commanders combo with Officers! Let's see you handle their combined might, Mitsutagawa!
—Tatsumi Raido

900231130.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: If another allied Levin card is in play, gain +1/+1.
900231130.baseFlair_: I'm Mena, fighter of the Sky Knights! My role's to punch and punch up a storm! Let me handle this—I'll knock down any enemy!
900231130.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
900231130.evoFlair_: Even by the Sky Knights' standards, she's an exceptional combatant. Though every once in a while, she seems to forget the strategy. —Albert, Levin Champion

105241010.baseEffect_: When another allied Swordcraft follower comes into play, return this follower to your hand.
105241010.baseFlair_: A lovely dress, beautiful jewels, and clear glass slippers. Yes, I'm a princess—at least until the clock strikes midnight.
105241010.evoFlair_: The spell will fade sooner or later. It’s all right; I understood that. But please just do this one thing for me. When you see this glass slipper, remember me and how I was for that single night.

106241010.baseEffect_: Whenever another allied Swordcraft follower comes into play, give it +0/+1 and Clash: Gain +1/+0.
106241010.baseFlair_: Quietly, oh so quietly my flames grow taller. I'm waiting for it, the battlefield great enough to feed my ultimate flames.
106241010.evoFlair_: I've waited for this hour—for this moment! I can't stand it anymore! I'll burn until all that's left are ashes and cinder!

110241010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Remove all Last Words effects on an enemy follower and give those effects to this follower.
Enhance (8): Gain +2/+2 and the ability to evolve for 0 evolution points. Recover 2 play points.
110241010.baseFlair_: The true enemy of the world is satisfaction. Craving begets desire; desire begets progress. Usurp and pillage; hunger and thirst... So come, let us put this world to trial.
110241010.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Randomly put 2 of the following cards into your hand.
-Gilded Blade
-Gilded Goblet
-Gilded Boots
-Gilded Necklace
110241010.evoFlair_: The true benefactor of the world is undying hunger; the eternal craving drives us all. The skies, the land, freedom and desire—soon it will all be mine... So come, let us put this world to trial.

111241020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Randomly put 1 of the highest-cost Swordcraft followers that cost X play points or less from your deck into your hand. X equals your total play point orbs plus 1.
111241020.baseFlair_: There is no reason for war. The spilled blood and gun smoke, the blighted land... all are meaningless. So at least... let us grant victory to our children. Let glory heal their wounded spirits.
111241020.evoEffect_: Evolve: Give +0/+1 to all other allied followers.
111241020.evoFlair_: No matter how we struggle to protect them, we cannot stop humans from hurting one another. And so, instead, please rest easy. There is nothing to fear... Even should you cast off your earthly shell, I'll be with you.

114241030.baseEffect_:
Ambush.
Fanfare: If at least 10 allied followers have been destroyed this match, gain +1/+1 and destroy a random enemy follower with the highest attack in play.
114241030.baseFlair_: Cherry blossoms scatter across the imperial capital on a chilly night. A malevolent katana, hell-bent on vengeance, cuts through all manner of opposition. "Taste the vengeance of my blade."
114241030.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
114241030.evoFlair_: The amount of training that goes into polishing her sword technique is untold, just as the lament over past tragedies is limitless. The moonlit night gives form to the trajectory of her blade as it slices through the air. "The misty mark of the forge upon my blade is the last thing you will see."

714241010.baseEffect_:
Ambush.
Fanfare: If at least 10 allied followers have been destroyed this match, gain +1/+1 and destroy a random enemy follower with the highest attack in play.
714241010.baseFlair_: Cherry blossoms scatter across the imperial capital on a chilly night. A malevolent katana, hell-bent on vengeance, cuts through all manner of opposition. "Taste the vengeance of my blade."
714241010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
714241010.evoFlair_: The amount of training that goes into polishing her sword technique is untold, just as the lament over past tragedies is limitless. The moonlit night gives form to the trajectory of her blade as it slices through the air. "The misty mark of the forge upon my blade is the last thing you will see."

115241020.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: Union Burst (10) - Gain +3/+3. Deal 5 damage to an enemy follower.
At the end of your turn, gain +0/+1.
115241020.baseFlair_: Hiya! How ya doin'? I'm the Princess of Peckish, Pecorine! The truth is that's a nickname, but I'm really fond of it! It's the absolute best!
115241020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
115241020.evoFlair_: All I want is to eat loads of delicious food with the people I care about... I'll do whatever it takes to make that happen! Here I go! Full speed ahead!

117241010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Transform this follower into a VII. Oluon, Runaway Chariot.
At the end of your turn, randomly activate 1 of the following effects.
-Gain Ward.
-Summon a Knight.
-Deal 2 damage to the enemy leader.
117241010.baseFlair_:
The weight I bear is that of my noble liege!
Roads! Yield to The Chariot, vehicle of momentum!
Lead us now, my liege, to glory with spear and sword!
Onward we shall ride, forging a path to everlasting glory!
117241010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
117241010.evoFlair_:
Ride on! The Chariot's wheels score the earth!
Onto the battlefield! Rider and steed move as one!
Valiant knights! Trample the helms of foes underfoot!
Glory is ambrosia on our tongues, and victory sweeter still!

120241020.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Whenever an allied Officer follower comes into play, give it the following effect: Can't be targeted by enemy effects. Then restore 1 defense to your leader.
120241020.baseFlair_: In memory of an ill-fated paladin, whose faith in her mistress never wavered. An army of formidable warriors flocked to her, drawn by her virtue. However, the minister of the time deemed her a threat, and she was banished from her homeland. —Cenotaph: Maiden of the Dawn
120241020.evoEffect_:
Ward.
Evolve: Summon 3 Shield Guardians.
Whenever an allied Officer follower comes into play, give it the following effect: Can't be targeted by enemy effects. Then restore 1 defense to your leader.
120241020.evoFlair_: Just as a grave peril threatened the nation, a flag with the emblem of the sun rose like the dawn. The paladin died protecting her mistress and was hailed a hero. "Did the Maiden really die, Grandma?" "Hehe... As a certain person once said, 'The dawn has come.'"

121241020.baseEffect_:
Ambush.
Fanfare: If at least 10 allied followers have been destroyed this match, evolve this follower.
At the start of your turn, deal 1 damage to all enemies.
121241020.baseFlair_: We are the blades that cut through Isunia's darkness, the moon that casts a light on those who sully the canals. If it's for Isunia, we'll gladly cloak ourselves in night, but fair warning: we've cast aside regrets along with the fear of death—and so must you.
121241020.evoEffect_:
Ambush.
At the start of your turn, deal 3 damage to all enemies.
121241020.evoFlair_: Sun and moon once worked together for justice; but the moon's deeds were too dark to be seen in the light of day. The moon sank but continued to work in secret. Though its history was obscured, Countersolari's labors are reflected in Isunia's shining canals today.

121241030.baseEffect_:
Storm.
Fanfare: Rally (7) - Put a Killer Instincts into your hand.
Whenever another allied follower or amulet comes into play, gain +1/+0 until the end of your turn.
121241030.baseFlair_: Once, she was the princess's sword and shield, though her past clouded her loyalty. Now, a flame flickers within her: she desires strength to stand by her allies. The viridian goddess hears her plea and gives her the power to blaze a new path and burn the darkness.
121241030.evoEffect_:
Storm.
Evolve: Rally (15) - Put an Erika's Sleight into your hand.
Whenever another allied follower or amulet comes into play, gain +1/+0 until the end of your turn.
121241030.evoFlair_: Why do I fight? What are good and evil? I still don’t know. My blade is stained with my dark deeds... But I won't look back; I won't give up. I have comrades now, and they'll stand by me from now until... Anyway, as long as I draw breath, I'll fight for them.

122241020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a random spell from your deck into your hand.
122241020.baseFlair_:
Ohohoho! Riches! Prestige! Influence! They all dance in the palm of my hand. Now then, I suppose it's time I taught you your place.
—Miyabi Zaizenji
122241020.evoFlair_:
Ohohoho! Didn't you know? When you have both money and influence, you're matchless. Now then, I suppose it's time I taught you how different we are.
—Miyabi Zaizenji

123241010.baseEffect_:
When this follower comes into play, if your Rally count is at least 10 (excluding this card), evolve it.
Last Words: Give your leader the following effect - At the start of your turn after your next turn, summon a Kagemitsu, Lost Samurai and remove this effect. (This effect is not stackable.)
123241010.baseFlair_: My blade grows restless in its sheath, thirsting for the blood it once drank freely. It would be an honor to accept this Trial of Usurpation, and polish my shamefully rusty skills on the battlefield.
123241010.evoEffect_:
Storm.
Strike: If allied followers have evolved at least 5 times this match, deal 2 damage to all enemies. If allied followers have evolved at least 7 times, deal 4 damage instead.
123241010.evoFlair_: I overcame the trial, and now true mastery of the blade shall belong to me, and me alone. The void in me has been filled with insatiable hunger for greater heights... Allow me to carve the gospel of usurpation into your flesh!

123241020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Select an enemy follower. If it has any Last Words effects, gain those effects. Do the same for any Strike, Ward, Storm, Bane, Drain, Rush, and Clash effects.
Fanfare: Randomly put 1 of the following cards into your hand.
-Gilded Blade
-Gilded Goblet
-Gilded Boots
-Gilded Necklace
Fanfare: Rally (8) - Gain the ability to evolve for 0 evolution points.
123241020.baseFlair_: The world wants you to be complacent with what you have. So give it all away. Starve. Learn how to survive the hard way, and you can steal it all back—and more. That is your next trial.
123241020.evoEffect_: Evolve: Put a Remnant of Hollowness into your hand.
123241020.evoFlair_: Give away your plunder. Only by giving will you know the hollowness of need; only by tasting wealth will the complacent masses learn to fear loss. Then, all will know the hunger that inspires usurpation.

124241030.baseEffect_:
Bane.
Can evolve for 0 evolution points.
124241030.baseFlair_: Let us begin, right away. Even the smallest spark of excitement has the potential to spread into the greatest of fires on the battlefield. So let it burn, burn, burn! Ah, I simply cannot wait any longer!
124241030.evoEffect_:
Bane.
Evolve: If there are at least 20 Officer followers in your deck, summon a Flame General's Regalia.
124241030.evoFlair_: Spread the flames of war, till naught remains but ash and steel! War's inferno knows no end, so rage on until the end of time! What was once a mere spark... may it engulf an entire battlefield!

718241010.baseEffect_:
Bane.
Can evolve for 0 evolution points.
718241010.baseFlair_: Let us begin, right away. Even the smallest spark of excitement has the potential to spread into the greatest of fires on the battlefield. So let it burn, burn, burn! Ah, I simply cannot wait any longer!
718241010.evoEffect_:
Bane.
Evolve: If there are at least 20 Officer followers in your deck, summon a Flame General's Regalia.
718241010.evoFlair_: Spread the flames of war, till naught remains but ash and steel! War's inferno knows no end, so rage on until the end of time! What was once a mere spark... may it engulf an entire battlefield!

126241020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Choose - Put 1 of the following cards into your hand.
-Wee Merchant's Appraisal
-Graceful Maneuver
-Dualblade Flurry
Then, Rally (10): Subtract 3 from its cost until the end of the turn.
When you play a spell, evolve this follower.
126241020.baseFlair_: "We lost the battle by reason of dull blades and rusted shields." Preposterous. Accolade-seeking commanders fearful for their own hides caused this mess. Our wealth and resources should not serve as a shield, but a mighty sword with which we can crush all opposition.
126241020.evoEffect_:
Whenever you play a spell, activate 1 of the following effects in order (up to 6 times per turn).
1. Restore 2 defense to your leader.
2. Draw a card.
3. Give +1/+1 to all allied followers.
126241020.evoFlair_: Any nation worth its weight in gold employs a properly trained and motivated force. Ultimate victory is attained through superior resources and armaments, and these things are directly influenced by the flow of coin. Let us crush our enemies under the weight of our wallet.

128241010.baseEffect_:
Bane.
Fanfare: Rally (15) - Put a Twilight Blade into your hand and change its cost to 1.
128241010.baseFlair_:
"Enchanting a sword is harder than it sounds..."
"Need help, Lecia? Let's give it a try together!"
"Thanks, Nano! C'mon, let's think of something that'll blow Monika away when we get back!"
—Légen Exchange Experience
128241010.evoEffect_:
Bane.
Evolve: Summon a Support Cannon.
128241010.evoFlair_:
I underestimated you two. I mean, look at that! I can hardly believe my eyes! It seems like Légen was the perfect fit. And, uh... what's a "polliwog?"
—Monika, Exchange Program Afterparty

900241090.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Clash: Summon a Knight. If any allied Queen Magnus the Gracefuls are in play, summon a Steelclad Knight instead.
900241090.baseFlair_: You may think me to be naive, but I wish to be a gentle king. Let us overcome this pain, hand in hand, and move beyond. I care not what fate says we must do—our "roles" be damned, my conviction is unwavering!
900241090.evoEffect_:
Ward.
Clash: Summon a Knight. If any allied Queen Magnus the Gracefuls are in play, summon a Steelclad Knight instead.
Strike: Gain +1/+1.
900241090.evoFlair_:
Chasing after powerless ideals is nothing more than a fool's errand. Surely there is more to this game beyond the "roles" assigned to us.
—Queen Magnus the Graceful

900241100.baseEffect_: While this follower is in play, all other allied followers in play and that come into play have Rush.
900241100.baseFlair_: Even if we turn this game upside-down, I will be the queen. If I am to play my hand, I will not allow this to be taken. Unwavering is my devotion, "roles" be damned—this is who I am!
900241100.evoEffect_:
Strike: Recover 1 play point.
While this follower is in play, all other allied followers in play and that come into play have Rush.
900241100.evoFlair_:
While some things may change, I respect her will to remain true to herself. It seems that the role to reign was befitting of her.
—Queen Hemera the Brave

900241110.baseEffect_:
Rush.
During your turn, whenever another allied follower comes into play, give it +1/+1 and gain +1/+1.
900241110.baseFlair_: Mademoiselle, I am not here to save you, but to help you save yourself—and all the others imprisoned here! I am but a sword and shield for your revolution. One for all, and all for one!
900241110.evoFlair_:
Apologies... I'm afraid Aramis isn't here today either. Hm? Yes, he is indeed a very kind and noble man. Now if you would be so kind as to leave, you're the third woman to come calling for him today—Ah! No, please don't cry...
—D'Artagnan, to a Lovesick Woman

900241120.baseEffect_:
Bane.
At the end of your turn, deal X damage to a random enemy follower. X equals this follower's attack.
900241120.baseFlair_: What happens, happens. You've just gotta take life's punches in stride. 'Sides, the mead's always sweetest after a day of hard work, surrounded by the friends you're fighting for. One for all, and all for one!
900241120.evoFlair_:
I know he's a big, loud, scary demon-man, but I promise he's not going to hurt you. All those extra arm... things? Are so he can help lots and lots more people, okay?
—D'Artagnan, to a Frightened Child

900241130.baseEffect_:
Ward.
At the end of your turn, fully restore this follower's defense and restore X defense to your leader. X equals the defense restored to this follower.
900241130.baseFlair_: It's hard to trust a man with seemingly no ulterior motives, but that boy's the real deal. He genuinely desires the good of both king and kingdom—and will make an excellent successor. One for all, and all for one!
900241130.evoFlair_:
I can see why Porthos and Aramis put so much faith in him. He's a true leader and hero, just... he's always so strict with me. Did I offend him?
—D'Artagnan, to a Maid

900241140.baseEffect_:
Storm.
Strike: If any allied Porthoses are in play, gain +1/+1.
Strike: If any allied Athoses are in play, gain +1/+1.
900241140.baseFlair_: One for all, and all for one! ...I've always lived by those words, wishing I could be like the Musketeers someday—and now I'm a member. It... it hardly feels real.
900241140.evoFlair_:
"Heh, kid's a big dreamer. He's going places." "That stubborn goody two-shoes? ...I suppose he's learning, though." "He is. It won't be long before our little fledgling flies the nest."
—Porthos, Aramis, and Athos

100214020.baseEffect_:
Give +2/+2 to an allied follower.
Rally (10): Give +4/+4 instead.
100214020.baseFlair_: One hot blade, comin' right up!

713214020.baseEffect_:
Give +2/+2 to an allied follower.
Rally (10): Give +4/+4 instead.
713214020.baseFlair_:
I'm gonna keep sharpenin' my skills, ya know? You ain't ready for this—Forge Weaponry!
—Kazuki Shindo

101214030.baseEffect_: Destroy an enemy follower with at least 5 attack.
101214030.baseFlair_: The little stuff isn't my problem... uh, sir!

103214020.baseEffect_:
Deal 4 damage to an enemy follower.
Enhance (8): Then summon a Ninja Master.

105214010.baseEffect_: Give +2/+4 to an allied Neutral follower. Then change that follower into a Swordcraft Commander.
105214010.baseFlair_: The kiss of a beautiful princess can turn a frog into a person, or a soldier into a hero.

107214010.baseEffect_: Destroy an enemy follower with 5 defense or less.
107214010.baseFlair_: It craws in the dark, like a shadow. It's grip tightens, like a snake. The art of the ninja is not one for theatrics, but enshrouded with murderous intent.

116214010.baseEffect_:
Put a Gilded Goblet and Gilded Necklace into your hand.
Recover 1 evolution point.
116214010.baseFlair_: Only pure eyes can spot pure gems.

118214010.baseEffect_:
Summon a Thief and give it Rush.
Enhance (5): Summon 2 instead.
118214010.baseFlair_: You there! Either gimme your money or gimme your life! Better yet, just gimme both!

120214010.baseEffect_:
Put a random 1-play-point Swordcraft follower from your deck into play.
Draw 2 cards.
120214010.baseFlair_: Underpinning every achievement is countless hours of careful preparation.

715214010.baseEffect_:
Put a random 1-play-point Swordcraft follower from your deck into play.
Draw 2 cards.
715214010.baseFlair_:
Wait, which costume was I supposed to wear for the next scene, again? Hm, the producer should know!
—Uzuki Shimamura

128224010.baseEffect_:
Deal 4 damage to a random enemy follower.
Summon 2 Heavy Knights. Rally (10): Summon 2 Novice Troopers instead.
128224010.baseFlair_:
The kingdom's brightest strategist was in shambles.
"An enemy spotted behind us?! But... but how?!"
Meanwhile, the empire's dullest knight was overjoyed.
"I can't believe I got lost agai—oh! Is that them?! GUUUYS! I FINALLY FOUND YOU!"

717224010.baseEffect_:
Deal 4 damage to a random enemy follower.
Summon 2 Heavy Knights. Rally (10): Summon 2 Novice Troopers instead.

115234010.baseEffect_:
Put a random 1-play-point and 2-play-point Swordcraft follower from your deck into play.
Enhance (8): Then, put a random 3-play-point Swordcraft follower from your deck into play and evolve them. (Evolve effects will not activate.)
115234010.baseFlair_: Welcome to the battlefield of nobility.

116234010.baseEffect_:
Choose: Use play points equal to this card's cost and play this card as an Erika's Sleight, Mistolina's Swordplay, or Bayleon's Command.
Enhance (6): Instead summon 2 Quickbladers, deal 5 damage to a random enemy follower, and give +1/+1 to all allied followers.
116234010.baseFlair_: The blight spreads across the verdant world. Viridia Magna lets loose her howl. Undaunted, a young soldier whispers, "Though my past is carved in blood, my future has yet to be written."

118234010.baseEffect_: Give an allied follower Strike: Deal X damage to all enemy followers. X equals this follower's attack.
118234010.baseFlair_:
Your miserable lives deserve a beautiful end at the very least!
—Rapier Master

122244010.baseEffect_:
Choose: Summon a Queen Hemera the Brave or Queen Magnus the Graceful.
Enhance (6): Summon both instead and evolve them.
122244010.baseFlair_: Black and white. King and Queen. Unwavering and relentless, they've laid their swords onto the board—and the eternal contest goes on.

104222010.baseEffect_: Whenever an allied Commander follower comes into play, give it +1/+1.

112222010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Recover 1 evolution point.
During your turn, when an allied follower evolves, give +1/+1 to all allied followers, then banish this amulet.
112222010.baseFlair_: An orb of concentrated firepower. Those who seek glory find themselves drawn to its luster.

709222010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Recover 1 evolution point.
During your turn, when an allied follower evolves, give +1/+1 to all allied followers, then banish this amulet.

102232020.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, give +1/+1 to all allied followers that have Ambush active.
102232020.baseFlair_: Hold your breath, still your body, and take your prey.

103233010.baseEffect_:
Countdown (15)
Whenever an allied follower comes into play, subtract 1 from this amulet's Countdown.
Last Words: Give +1/+1 and Storm to all allied Swordcraft followers.
103233010.baseFlair_: An airborne castle that seems to scorn the earth. Untold power is held there, but the castle still sleeps.

900242030.baseEffect_: Whenever you play a follower, give it +1/+1, Rush, and Clash: Deal 1 damage to the enemy leader.
900242030.baseFlair_: I've waited so long for the perfect battlefield to set ablaze...

100211040.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give +2/+0 to an allied Officer follower.
100211040.baseFlair_: Men, give me your swords! With pride and dignity in our hearts, we knights shall drive the monsters out of this fortress!
100211040.evoFlair_: It is in times of difficulty that a man's faith is truly tested! Come, men! We cannot rest until the monsters have been eradicated!

101211070.baseFlair_: I have but one duty to fulfill: to give my life in the service of my king! There is no greater honor for a knight than to fall during battle!
101211070.evoFlair_: My sword may buckle, my armor may crack, but my spirit shall never waver! While breath remains in my lungs, there shall be no rest for the wicked!

102211060.baseFlair_: I take pride in guarding my kingdom, and, as long as I stand, none shall pass through this gate!
102211060.evoFlair_: Their attack has faltered. Now's our chance! Steel your hearts, for now we strike back!

109211020.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, put a random 1-play-point Swordcraft follower from your deck into play.
109211020.baseFlair_: Maybe it's because I've never worn clothes like this, but this dress makes me feel kind of self-conscious. Mmm... It is really soft though.
109211020.evoFlair_: I put so much pressure on myself because I was hung up on the past. I guess that's just the way I am. But maybe I can take a little holiday from being me, just for now.

110211010.baseEffect_: Clash: Deal 1 damage to a random enemy follower.
110211010.baseFlair_: You looking down at me because I'm a woman? Ha! You're the one wobbling around in that ill-fitting armor like it was your first pair of heels. I could topple you with a finger!
110211010.evoFlair_: Don't step onto the battlefield if you don't know the waltz of war, debutante! I've sent everyone else on my dance card limping off to the cloakroom. Think you'll fare any better? Come on... I'll lead!

111211020.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Strike: Randomly put 1 of the following cards into your hand.
-Gilded Blade
-Gilded Goblet
-Gilded Boots
-Gilded Necklace
111211020.baseFlair_: Take and take again. Awaken the world to the pain of loss, to grief as deep as Hell. Leave them nothing, that they may know our hatred.
111211020.evoFlair_: There is no hierarchy in tradition's shadow. Linger not on rank or distinction. Steal from the rich and the poor, men and women, young and old. Take money, property, lives. Seize every shred of happiness and well-being.

119211040.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put 2 Grand Auctions into your hand.
119211040.baseFlair_: Ho there, bold adventurer! How'd you like to see the treasures of a bygone empire? See this stone? It'll guide you back to its homeland, and all the wonders of the ancient capital. An unforgettable adventure or your money back, guaranteed!
119211040.evoFlair_: Behold, the ruined walls from which this stone was hewn. The lights of this city have long since gone out, but when the sun sets it still glitters like a precious gem. This is only a shadow of the place's former glory, but I'm sure it'll sparkle on in your memories.

120211020.baseFlair_: It's our job as guardians to keep the enemy at bay. Hey, outta my way punk! Geez, lookin' at your mug makes me sick— Hah! You wanna start something? Try it—maybe you won't be as ugly if I give you a makeover in black and blue!
120211020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
120211020.evoFlair_:
"Hey, greenhorn. You ever wonder why he uses that truncheon?"
"Because it's good for holding a defensive line?"
"Naw, kid. He just wants to beat the living daylights out of his opponent." —Strikeprone Guardian's Comrades

121211020.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: Summon a Buccaneer.
Enhance (6): Then, summon a Viking.
121211020.baseFlair_: I used to fight under different colors; I fight under the skull banner now. I had accolades pinned to my uniform; chests of booty are now my badges of valor. Hah, don't fret. I just decided a change of allegiance was in order, that's all.
121211020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
121211020.evoFlair_: The only things a pirate vows loyalty to are freedom and the open sea! From now on, I'll earn my name on this boundless blue battlefield!

122211010.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Summon 2 Flowing Lancers.
Strike: Deal 1 damage to all enemy followers.
122211010.baseFlair_: They say given enough time, even a raindrop is capable of cracking stone. I'll spare you the wait, though. A stab through the torso should do the trick.
122211010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
122211010.evoFlair_: I wasn't born with these talents; I owe them to persistence—my training was as arduous as a raindrop cracking stone.

128211010.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: Enhance (6) - Summon a Fervent Fist-Fighter.
128211010.baseFlair_:
Our story begins in Légen, as all legends do... with the academy's admission of a princeling tiger. The boy ceaselessly boasted of his might—earning him thick steel instead of wood for the board-breaking exercise.
—The Striped Prince of Légen, Chapter 1
128211010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
128211010.evoFlair_: No one's born a hero, so all of our freshman start as "polliwogs!" Y'know... tadpoles! 'Cause we can't stand up for ourselves. That's why we start with martial arts, and, uh... Don't worry about the steel plates! Even a beginner can break 'em once you know how. Watch!

100221010.baseFlair_: Ever seen a knight more ravishing than me? Wait, what do you mean "Yes"? You, sir, will regret that!
100221010.evoEffect_: Evolve: Summon a Knight and a Steelclad Knight.
100221010.evoFlair_: Told you. My beauty runs deeper than you can ever imagine. Perhaps next time you won't be so quick to dismiss my good form, hm?

101221030.baseEffect_: Whenever an allied Officer follower comes into play, give it Storm.
101221030.baseFlair_: Where are the cowards in this lot? Where are the unworthy? True knights advance and take honor in charging into the fray. So advance, or I'll cut you down where you stand!
101221030.evoFlair_: You are no longer people! Each of you is nothing more than a single spear, or a single sword! So advance! Ride! Your corpses will be a bridge to our victory!

101221100.baseFlair_: I will not draw my sword at the bark of a mewling pup. If you wish to do battle with me, you need to prove yourself worthy.
101221100.evoEffect_: Evolve: Destroy an enemy follower with at least 5 attack.
101221100.evoFlair_: You clearly are worthy, so I shall show you my attack. If you survive, tell me what you think!

103221040.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: Enhance (6) - Gain Last Words: Summon 2 Knights.
103221040.baseFlair_: Attack me if you dare, youngling. There's a reason they call me the Hack and Slash Leader of the Sky Knights. Care to see?
103221040.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
103221040.evoFlair_: My mission is to free the captain from the bonds of the past for the sake of a brighter future. This axe won't take kindly to anyone who stands in my way!

104221040.baseFlair_: As the hidden blade that cuts down the wicked, I'll purge the darkness that shrouds this land.
104221040.evoFlair_: Even as my blade gleams in the darkness, so does it rust from the work that it does. So listen well, you who are tainted by the darkness: I shall cut the evil out of you.

107221010.baseEffect_: Whenever an allied Officer follower comes into play, restore 1 defense to your leader.
107221010.baseFlair_: In the name of king and country, I shall cut you down. This battle is far from over!
107221010.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Summon 2 Heavy Knights.
Whenever an allied Officer follower comes into play, restore 1 defense to your leader.
107221010.evoFlair_: In the name of king and country, I will not be defeated. The real battle begins now!

110221010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Choose - Put a Flarewing Spear or Frostwing Spear into your hand.
110221010.baseFlair_: I am Ephialtes! I have bestowed the body of man with martial art—such is my duty as the sanctified twin! My flaming spear ignites the very skies, scorching the heavens! You shall not escape!
110221010.evoFlair_: I am Otus. I have bestowed the body of man with cultural art—such is my duty as the consecrated twin. Time itself freezes before my icy spear. You shall not face me and survive.

112221020.baseEffect_: Strike: Deal 1 damage to all enemy followers. If another allied Machina follower is in play, deal 2 damage instead.
112221020.baseFlair_: Once the cannoneer had thrown the battlefield into confusion, a soldier equipped with a mechanical blade commenced his assault. With this deadly combination of power and speed, our forces have become even stronger. —Commander's Report, Part 2
112221020.evoFlair_: The new recruit is performing well. His swordplay perfectly complements tactics involving cannon fire. For enemies resistant to either of these attack methods, we're working on a way to overwhelm them with destructive force. —Battle Log, Part 2

122221010.baseEffect_:
Storm.
During your turn, whenever this follower attacks the enemy leader, draw 2 cards after damage is dealt.
122221010.baseFlair_: The stars above failed to heed my prayers. Very well... it seems that I must be the one to play this starry role! Like a shooting star, I'll be sure to grant wishes to all!
122221010.evoFlair_: "Quick to decide, quick to act! I go from decision to action in a flash!" Get all that, monster? If you wanna live, take a number! I juuust might let you survive, if you can repeat it three times fast!

122221030.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Rally (7) - Evolve this follower.
Strike: Restore 2 defense to your leader. Recover 2 play points.
122221030.baseFlair_: Is it so strange to wield two swords? One belonged to my father—the other, my teacher. Surely you wouldn't expect me to leave one behind.
122221030.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
122221030.evoFlair_: From my father, I learned determination. From my teacher, swordsmanship. Both parts I hold equally dear in my heart. Yet, I wonder... What will I have to offer to the next generation?

126221010.baseEffect_:
Storm.
Strike: If any damaged allied followers are in play, recover 2 play points.
126221010.baseFlair_:
Courage will always give you strength! That's what my favorite hero always says!
—Ren Kazamatsuri
126221010.evoFlair_:
With Shadowverse, I can be free! I can shout that I love something at the top of my lungs, and no one around me bats an eye! It's an amazing feeling!
—Ren Kazamatsuri

101231010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give all other allied followers Ambush.
101231010.baseFlair_: A girl strides through the darkness, a legion of assassins hanging on her every command. When she gives the word, the night shall be stained with blood once more.
101231010.evoFlair_: They call her the blade that brings order. To defend the tranquility of the night, she stains her hands with blood.

101231050.baseFlair_: With every impassioned swing of his sword, a cheer rang up among the rank and file. One by one, soldiers began to follow into the breach that Latham carved out. And the light of hope pushed back the darkness of despair.
101231050.evoFlair_: When soldiers rally to a single purpose, they form an army. And it was just such an army that—behind Latham's rallying cry—sought to usher in a new era for mankind, an era built atop the embers of their dark enemies' ashes.

103231020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Gelt, Vice Captain into your hand. Then, change its cost to 0 if at least 3 enemy followers are in play.
103231020.baseFlair_: My father left me with two things: a brave order and ceaselessly honed swordsmanship. With these weapons I'll face my foes!
103231020.evoFlair_: The time for tears is over. All that's left is to brandish this sword and fight! I'm sure Father is rooting for me even now from his perch in the heavens.

109231010.baseEffect_:
Ambush.
Fanfare: Choose - Put an Evyn, Novice Agent or Infiltration into your hand.
109231010.baseFlair_: Countless traps and snares, and all eyes on the lookout... Only a real agent would be able to slip through unnoticed. All right, I'm going in.
109231010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
109231010.evoFlair_: Collateral damage? Just another part of the job. The best time to show off is right in the face of danger, right? Anyway, let's keep going.

112231010.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Enhance (9) - Gain +3/+3 and the ability to evolve for 0 evolution points.
112231010.baseFlair_: The concept was so simple that even a child could dream it up: create a massive, peerless weapon. It is that very idea that we have employed to control the battlefield. —Commander's Report, Part 3
112231010.evoEffect_: Evolve: If you have at least 2 Machina cards in your hand, summon 3 Assembly Droids.
112231010.evoFlair_: Its power is phenomenal, but that very power has backfired against us. The civilians say it's terrifying, and we can't very well use a weapon that has been rejected by the people. What the world really needs right now is a hero. —Battle Log, Part 3

115231020.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Union Burst (10) - Deal 3 damage to the enemy leader. Gain the ability to evolve for 0 evolution points.
115231020.baseFlair_: Come on, let me spoil you a little. I always have been and always will be your big sister! So there's no need to be shy! Ready? Here comes a great, big hug!
115231020.evoEffect_:
Ward.
At the end of your turn, if you have more evolution points than your opponent, restore 3 defense to your leader and this follower. (You have 0 evolution points on turns you are unable to evolve.)
115231020.evoFlair_: Cooking, cleaning, laundry... running your bath, or even monster hunting! You can depend on me to take care of anything and everything! It's a big sister's duty to look after her little brother!

117231010.baseFlair_: I am the Eight of Swords, officer of observation. Do not move. Do not speak. Observe the battlefield with your mind's eye and wait. When the time for reinforcements comes, you will know.
117231010.evoEffect_: Evolve: Give your leader the following effect - At the end of your turn, summon a Steelclad Knight. (This effect is not stackable and lasts for the rest of the match.)
117231010.evoFlair_: Some call me the watcher and accuse me of sitting idle. It's not that I can't move. There is simply no need. Observe the battlefield in its entirety, and you will be in a prime position to make the final, decisive move.

120231010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Destroy a random evolved follower.
Whenever another allied follower is destroyed, gain +1/+0 and Storm.
120231010.baseFlair_: These arms are made to smash apart peace and stoke the fires of unending war. The battlefield is no shelter for weak pups. The whelps born in these scourging flames will be forged, as sharp and unbreakable as steel.
120231010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
120231010.evoFlair_: Justice without the force to back it is meaningless. To cull the weak is the burden of the strong. All the chaff has been winnowed, imbuing the blades of the survivors with naught but pure strength.

121231020.baseEffect_:
Bane.
Fanfare: If allied followers have evolved at least 3 times this match, gain the ability to evolve for 0 evolution points.
121231020.baseFlair_: He is a husk of a man, devoid of pride or conviction. Having survived many a battle, he eventually drifts toward an order of knights.
121231020.evoEffect_:
Bane.
Evolve: Banish an enemy follower or enemy amulet.
121231020.evoFlair_: The hollow man joins the knights. His heart fills with the joys of triumph and the sorrows of parting. He is empty no more, for he is replete with camaraderie. "This burden is one I’ll gladly bear."

124231010.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Strike: Draw a card and recover 1 play point.
124231010.baseFlair_: It's dry now, but these lands drastically change with the seasons. You know what I say? Rough terrain makes for rough warriors.
124231010.evoEffect_:
Strike: Draw a card and recover 1 play point.
Can attack 2 times per turn.
124231010.evoFlair_: Droughts during the dry season and flooding during the rainy season. I used to think this land was cursed, but was I wrong! As chief, I truly believe in the prosperity of our land!

128231010.baseEffect_:
Storm.
Fanfare: If any other allied Academic followers are in play, gain +0/+2.
Fanfare: Rally (15) - Gain the ability to attack 2 times per turn. Evolve this follower.
128231010.baseFlair_:
That day, the boy put his title behind him. He was as good as a sailor without sea legs, and the only way to find his footing was to ground himself. He trained relentlessly—until he could deflect a bullet with a blade.
—The Striped Prince of Légen, Chapter 4
128231010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
128231010.evoFlair_: It's finally that time of year, huh? I love seeing you polliwogs find your legs! Don't get yourself hurt, though. Cutting down bullets is risky business, buuut I could show you a trick or two. Heh. I can even cut down magic missiles, just like the Striped Knight!

128231020.baseFlair_: The start of a new term is so exciting! Look at all these fresh faces, ready to take on the—oh? Sorry, I know all the talk about the future can be daunting, but you can do it... and I can help!
128231020.evoEffect_: While this follower is in play, the enemy leader has the following effect: Allied Fanfare effects will not activate.
128231020.evoFlair_: Say, are you interested in developing your powers? I'd be happy to tutor you one-on-one. With talent like yours, you could surpass the divines above!

900231010.baseFlair_: I am the king of white. But once I was a castle, a rook. That might make me a fraud. But the burning pride and life in my chest are real.
900231010.evoFlair_: Many people have been hurt on this monochromatic battlefield. I can't allow any more of it. Sure, my rank is different from theirs, but... I'll color them white!

900231020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give all allied followers the following effect until the end of the opponent's turn - Reduce damage from effects to 0.
900231020.baseFlair_: I am the queen of black completely different from pawns like you. Humph, what's gotten into you? Your head's awfully high. Bow before me!
900231020.evoFlair_: I'm tired of this monochromatic battlefield. It's about time to move the hands of the clock forward. Your pitiful lives, your envious pride... all will be colored in ebon.

900231120.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Recover 2 play points. If another allied Levin card is in play, recover 3 instead.
900231120.baseFlair_: I'm Mona, mage of the Sky Knights! My job's to make you feel all happy and energetic! What do you say to getting cheerful?
900231120.evoFlair_: She has a rare ability to soothe the other Sky Knights' hearts. Though once in a while, she seems to intimidate them. —Albert, Levin Champion

104241020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Enhance (6) - Gain +1/+1 and Rush.
Strike: Subtract 1 from the cost of all Commanders in your hand.
104241020.baseFlair_: My mission as a Knight of the Round Table is to ensure our victory on every battlefield. And I shall clear the king's way forward across this battlefield as well!
104241020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
104241020.evoFlair_: I dedicate myself to serving my king, and I vow to bring him victories that will enable him to overcome the chains of destiny! My power will be the foundation for the glories of the future!

112241010.baseEffect_: During your turn, when an allied Officer follower comes into play, evolve this follower.
112241010.baseFlair_: I'm painfully aware of how cruel a place the battlefield can be. I know there are only so many people I can save. But I won't let that discourage me! Please, Nano... Lend me your power!
112241010.evoEffect_: Strike: If there are no allied Nano, the Dawnblades in play, summon 1. If this is your tenth turn or later, put a Twilight Blade into your hand.
112241010.evoFlair_: Thank you, Nano. I can sense the warmth of your kindness and the light of hope that shatters despair! Let's go, Nano! As long as we're together, we have nothing to fear!

114241020.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Give your leader the following effect - Once on each of your turns, when an effect restores your play points, put a King's Might into your hand. (This effect is not stackable and lasts for the rest of the match.)
114241020.baseFlair_:
"Viridia Magna created Naterra. We cannot oppose her."
Forever dreaming, forever hoping...
"We are Sköll. We seek to confer with the Virtuous Mother."
The Forest King seeks to become the light that will illuminate his kingdom.
114241020.evoFlair_:
"Aye, 'tis certain that Mánagarmr thinks us foolish."
Unwavering eyes peer into the shadow-ridden forest.
"And yet I won't abandon our cause. We will join under one banner again."
The Forest King stands tall, his proclamation delivered.

117241030.baseEffect_:
Reduce damage from effects to 0.
When an allied Officer follower comes into play, gain the ability to evolve for 0 evolution points.
117241030.baseFlair_: Let me see you live. Let me see you die. I want to see it all until the final curtain falls. We live in an age where anyone can take up arms, and everyone is brimming with malice. War is an unscripted play, and, lucky me, I have a front row seat.
117241030.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Put an Exterminus Weapon into your hand and subtract X from its cost. X equals the number of times that allied followers have evolved this match.
Reduce damage from effects to 0.
117241030.evoFlair_: A blade drips with viscera. Strategy decided, the soldiers await the call to arms. A banner flutters. They rise from the trenches, boots crunching on armor. War is an act of love, the miracle of life and death intertwined—and I'll make sure the miracles keep coming.

118241020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Put a Tyrant's Order into your hand.
Enhance (6): Summon 2 enemy Naht's Henchmen, then evolve this follower.
118241020.baseFlair_: The Titan of Force is true to her title. She's the villain of Rivayle, a coldhearted tyrant who keeps her side of town eating out of the palm of her hand. Better to obey the Cursed Queen than be "boxed" by her magic.
118241020.evoEffect_: At the end of your turn, deal 3 damage to a random enemy follower.
118241020.evoFlair_:
"That woman is terror incarnate. Loves to coffin her prey 'bout as much as she loves the smell of fear. She's got no interest in governing this land; she'd just as well see it burn."
—Vincent, the Peacekeeper

715241010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Put a Tyrant's Order into your hand.
Enhance (6): Summon 2 enemy Naht's Henchmen, then evolve this follower.
715241010.baseFlair_: The Titan of Force is true to her title. She's the villain of Rivayle, a coldhearted tyrant who keeps her side of town eating out of the palm of her hand. Better to obey the Cursed Queen than be "boxed" by her magic.
715241010.evoEffect_: At the end of your turn, deal 3 damage to a random enemy follower.
715241010.evoFlair_:
"That woman is terror incarnate. Loves to coffin her prey 'bout as much as she loves the smell of fear. She's got no interest in governing this land; she'd just as well see it burn."
—Vincent, the Peacekeeper

118241030.baseFlair_: The time has come to draw our swords. We face a grave threat, but have no fear, for our combined might is certain to see us past any adversity. Let us show the skies the power of our unity!
118241030.evoEffect_: Evolve: If all followers in your deck are Officer followers (excluding Walfrid, Sky Captain), give those followers +2/+2.
118241030.evoFlair_: Many have given their lives to protect the oppressed and to defend their country. It is on us to carry the torch and lead the way. Let us brandish our swords and show the true worth of an airship crew to all under the skies!

119241020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Put a random card with Enhance or Super Skybound Art from your deck into your hand.
Skybound Art (10): Evolve all unevolved allied Swordcraft followers. (Evolve effects will not activate.)
Super Skybound Art (15): Gain the following effects.
-Reduce damage to this follower to 0.
-Can't be destroyed by effects.
119241020.baseFlair_: The Eternals are the most powerful crew in the skies, and their leader is none other than... me! Seofon, the Star Sword Sovereign! Impressive, no? Well, being the leader also means I'm everyone's errand boy... it's not as though the others listen to a word I say. Sigh...
119241020.evoFlair_: With great power comes great responsibility. Oh, you don't get what I mean? Haha, that's fine. I'll protect the skies, even if no one understands. Even if it means I'll one day become an enemy to skydwellers everywhere.

124241020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put a Glittering Gold into your hand and subtract 1 from its cost. Then, if at least 3 Glittering Golds have been added to your hand this match, give your leader the following effect: Whenever you play a Glittering Gold, deal 2 damage to all enemy followers and then 1 damage to the enemy leader. (This effect is not stackable and lasts for the rest of the match.)
124241020.baseFlair_:
Oh, honey! You don't know how happy I am to see you! That thief everyone's been talking about came and busted me out! Said he'd come to collect someone's "beloved treasure," the charmer.
—Inn on the Outskirts of Town, Day 4
124241020.evoFlair_:
How you can ever repay me? Pfft. Keep the change—you two'll need it for your getaway. I'm only interested in real treasures, the kinda stuff worth riskin' your life for! And your love, my friends, was worth it.
—Jiemon, Thief Lord

126241010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Draw cards until there are 7 cards in your hand. Change the costs of all Heroic followers in your hand to 0 until the end of the turn.
Can't take more than 3 damage at a time.
126241010.baseFlair_:
Shadowverse showed me that I can always just be myself! That there's no need to abandon my dreams or the things that I love!
—Ren Kazamatsuri
126241010.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Give your leader the following effect - Whenever an allied Heroic follower comes into play, give it +0/+3 and Rush. (This effect is not stackable and lasts for the rest of the match.)
Can't take more than 3 damage at a time.
126241010.evoFlair_:
Time to play my ace! Strike now with your invincible justice, Valiant Fencer!
—Ren Kazamatsuri

127241010.baseEffect_:
Fusion: Loot cards
When a card is fused to this card, gain the ability to evolve for 0 evolution points.
----------
Fanfare: Put a Dread Pirate's Flag into your hand. If you've fused or played at least 7 Loot cards this match, recover 3 play points.
Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Gain Storm.
127241010.baseFlair_: To be a pirate is to be free. Freedom is the greatest treasure of all. Virtue and morality be damned; if you've got something in your sights, you take it. Join me; we'll raise our sinful sails and start a new golden age for pirates!
127241010.evoFlair_: Sin is just the natural freedom that we're born with. "Morality" is a curse men let steer their hearts. There's nothing to fear—stick with me, and we'll make the seas ours! A new golden age of vice and piracy begins under my flag!

900241040.baseEffect_:
Storm.
Fanfare: Enhance (10) - Gain the ability to ignore Ward, and recover 6 play points.
900241040.baseFlair_: Gah... Can't believe I got stuck in a monster trap... But hah! This should do the trick! Wait... It's not working! No, no, no... At this rate, I'll be stuck here forever...
900241040.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
900241040.evoFlair_: Doesn't matter what you throw at me, I'll never yield! Now for my counterattack! Embrasque Sword! Feast on their fate! Immortal Assault!

900241080.baseEffect_:
Maneuver: Followers that originally cost at least 2 play points
Storm.
Strike: Randomly activate 2 of the following effects.
-Draw a card.
-Deal 2 damage to the enemy leader.
-Deal 3 damage to a random enemy follower.
-Restore 4 defense to your leader.
900241080.baseFlair_:
"No way they'll hit us while we're cruising in Val. She's equipped with arcane tires and dequipped with the stock limiters."
—Baron
900241080.evoFlair_:
"Pfft, who cares what makes her tick... Do you feel this wind, this speed?! Ol' Val's got the hustle for our bustle, and I love it!"
—Bunny

101214010.baseFlair_: In her passionate dance of encouragement, even cold feet are warmed again.

113214010.baseEffect_:
Put a random Swordcraft follower that costs 2 play points or less from your deck into play.
Deal 4 damage to an enemy follower.
113214010.baseFlair_: To act without strategy is reckless. To act with will is courage.

115214010.baseEffect_: Deal 4 damage to an enemy follower. Draw 2 cards.
115214010.baseFlair_:
The shogun of the era falls ill, and countless samurai seek to rule in his place. As swords are drawn from their scabbards, the flames of war are ignited throughout the land.
—Hosho Era, Year 23: Breaking Point

713214010.baseEffect_: Deal 4 damage to an enemy follower. Draw 2 cards.

123214010.baseEffect_:
Deal 10 damage to an enemy follower.
Rally (10): Deal 10 damage to another random enemy follower.
123214010.baseFlair_: You can't just shoot off a cannon and hope for the best. You need a coordinated, calculated effort.

900224030.baseEffect_: Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower, then deal 3 damage to the enemy leader.
900224030.baseFlair_:
You weak souls who cower at the cold... I shall burn you to cinders!
—Ephialtes of the Aloadae

101234010.baseEffect_: Draw X cards. X equals the number of allied followers in play.
101234010.baseFlair_: For the good of our next war.

107234010.baseEffect_:
Summon a Shield Guardian and a Knight.
Deal 1 damage to all enemy followers.
107234010.baseFlair_: I seek not glory from awards or decorations, but to only conquer adversity.

108213010.baseEffect_:
Countdown (3)
Fanfare: If there are fewer allied followers than enemy followers in play, summon a Heavy Knight.
At the end of your opponent's turn, summon a Heavy Knight.
108213010.baseFlair_: Behind this wall are allies I must protect. Before this wall are enemies I must defeat. That's why I stand here. —Nameless soldier

100222010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Give +1/+0 to all allied Officer followers.
Whenever an allied Officer follower comes into play, give it +1/+0.
100222010.baseFlair_: All who dare speak ill of our flag are traitors!

100211050.baseFlair_: Dead men tell no tales, so the saying goes. It's true enough, in my experience.
100211050.evoFlair_: The dead may not speak, but your corpse will let the world know what I'm capable of—make no mistake.

101211080.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Gain Ward if an allied Commander card is in play.
101211080.baseFlair_: Halt. Beyond here lies the domain of my lord. As long as I live, none shall pass.
101211080.evoFlair_: Let fly your arrows; humble me with your hordes. But mark my words: No harm shall befall my ward.

102211040.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give all allied Officer followers +1/+0.
102211040.baseFlair_: Glorious victory awaits us at the end of this battle. But to get there we must advance! Advance!
102211040.evoFlair_: If we prevail here, trust that peace will come. So advance, and never look back!

102211050.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Put 2 random Officer cards from your deck into your hand.
102211050.baseFlair_: Time to open a way! Stay right behind me, everyone!
102211050.evoFlair_: Your armor can't stop this sword! Consider yourself warned if you'd stand in my way!

104211030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If an allied Commander follower is in play, gain Last Words: Summon a Tristan of the Round Table.
104211030.baseFlair_: As a Knight of the Round Table, I have a duty to fulfill, and I will allow nothing to stop me from seeing it done. Never will I forget that there is a place for me waiting by her side!
104211030.evoFlair_: The quiet pain in my chest... my thirst for everything you are... All must be suppressed to fulfill my knightly duty. I must aid my king in building his regal paradise!

105211010.baseEffect_:
Ambush.
Fanfare: Summon a Kunoichi Trainee.
105211010.baseFlair_: If you try to harm my liege, then I'll serve as your adversary. I've come from the darkness to take your lives!
105211010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
105211010.evoFlair_: My life exists for the sake of my liege. I'll dispatch any of his enemies!

106211030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Evolve this follower if there is an allied non-Swordcraft follower in play.
106211030.baseFlair_: Next I shall sing your praises, Castor! Brilliant horseman, superb tactician—an unlucky arrow sent you to Hades, your sublimity untarnished.
106211030.evoFlair_: Even though we're separated by that infernal place, we're still brothers and compatriots. My song for you ascends the heavens and reaches the gods, becoming a star whose light will never fade.

107211010.baseFlair_: My liege, are you unharmed? Rest assured, your safety is of utmost importance.
107211010.evoFlair_: My liege, are you unharmed? Fear not, we shan't let a single shred of harm touch you.

114211020.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Randomly put 2 different Levin cards (excluding Levin Scholar) from your deck into your hand.
114211020.baseFlair_: Sigh... Mysterious ruins are always such a head-splitting challenge. But if it's arithmetic prowess you seek, I'd be glad to be of assistance. All calculations are, in essence, puzzles. And every puzzle has an answer. I won't disappoint.
114211020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
114211020.evoFlair_: Very well, I promise to give every puzzle my all... Actually, hm... What an unexpected turn of events. I can't read a single word.

117211020.baseEffect_: Fanfare: If an allied Commander card is in play, evolve this follower.
117211020.baseFlair_: The way I see it, one soldier is both a force unto herself and part of a greater force. Many of our brethren have paved the way, so that someone might deal the foe a crushing blow. If I'm chosen to be the spearhead, my victory will be your victory as well.
117211020.evoFlair_: Oh, glorious day. I've been chosen to carry the hopes of my comrades. But please, don't forget: the reason my lance can deal this final blow is because you, my brothers and sisters in arms, have pierced a path to victory.

119211010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Give all allied Officer followers the following effect - Clash: Deal 2 damage to the enemy leader.
Clash: Deal 2 damage to the enemy leader.
119211010.baseFlair_: Ain't no time to rest, kiddo—no one ever got what they want by sittin' around. If you want somethin', you've gotta grasp victory with your own two hands!
119211010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
119211010.evoFlair_: To the empty-handed go the bigger spoils, so throw down yer weapons an' throw up your fists! Now show me your hunger, and grasp victory with your own two hands!

120211030.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: Enhance (8) - Summon a War Boar. Then evolve all unevolved allied War Boars.
120211030.baseFlair_:
Why, I've raised this little feller since he was a wee piglet. Ain't that much different from raisin' a pup. Besides, when he gets goin', he can rip enemies a new blowhole with his tusks.
—War Boar's Adoptive Human
120211030.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
120211030.evoFlair_:
When I got my dog some new armor, the boar kicked up a fuss. So I got him some as well; all custom. And a good thing, too—he was already a formidable fighter, but he's even more of a threat now when he goes hog wild.
—War Boar's Adoptive Human

101221040.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal X damage to the enemy leader. X equals the number of allied Officer followers in play.
101221040.baseFlair_: Let resolve be my sword, virtue my guide. And may this cursed blood that courses through my veins never succeed in seeing me fall from grace.
101221040.evoFlair_: I have proved myself as a knight. Now crimson-draped with Holy Lance in hand, I seek the Holy Grail. I will see my desires come true, and I will bring glory to my king!

101221060.baseFlair_: Reinforcements, when called upon, serve one purpose: turning the tide of battle! Come, comrades, our time is now!
101221060.evoFlair_: We shall show you no quarter, vile beasts. Step aside now, or face certain doom where you stand!

103221020.baseFlair_: Don't be fooled by my appearance. I'm a seasoned officer tempered in the fires of battle! Now, my proud warriors, take to the skies with me!
103221020.evoEffect_: Evolve: Deal X damage to an enemy follower. X equals the number of allied followers in play.
103221020.evoFlair_: With this sword, I'll fight for the people of Valeria... Hey! Quit patting my head! I'm an airship admiral, so show a little respect!

104221020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Summon a Luminous Knight.
While this follower is in play, allied Commander followers can evolve for 0 evolution points.
104221020.baseFlair_: To end this age of darkness, we sacrificed our names. Now advance, knight, until this world at last knows peace.
104221020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
104221020.evoFlair_: Ours is the magic of light infused with the prayers of the people and the wishes of those who fight beside us. And we shall turn the power of hope to light!

114221010.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: If an allied Naterran Great Tree is in play, recover 3 play points.
Fanfare: Enhance (8) - Gain Storm.
114221010.baseFlair_:
You fleet-footed felines leap through the air with such fluidity and grace. Your erratic movements confound the enemy! Before they can recover from their confusion, our voices rise in cries of victory!
—Hordes singing the praises of their warrior brethren
114221010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
114221010.evoFlair_:
You fleet-footed felines possess bodies that require no rest, allowing you to advance through the most treacherous terrain with ease. March on to new battlefields, and show the enemy your pride as beastfolk!
—Hordes seeing off their warrior brethren

115221010.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Whenever this follower attacks and destroys an enemy follower, if this follower is not destroyed, evolve it.
115221010.baseFlair_:
The battles rage on, one after another. The people, the emperor, even the rice fields are exhausted. Eventually the only ones left fighting in the great war are the samurai.
—Ranno Era, Year 4: Changing Times
115221010.evoFlair_:
By the blood of five generations of emperors, along with countless rulers and samurai alike, the long battle finally comes to an end. There is no one left for the samurai to cut down.
—Bunji Era, Year 5: War's End

118221020.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: If you have at least 2 Commander cards in your hand, gain +1/+1.

118221020.baseFlair_: Everyone ridiculed his weapon as antiquated and inefficient. But he was adamant, asserting that in a situation where there aren't enough doctors to go around, every rock is a formidable weapon.
118221020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
118221020.evoFlair_: Swords were broken, arrows were depleted. Firearms, gunpowder, and even magic were all spent. As dire as the situation seemed, he remained resolute, racing across the battlefield with rocks in hand.

123221010.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Summon 4 Knights.
Whenever an allied Knight comes into play, randomly activate 1 of the following effects.
-Give it +1/+1.
-Give it Ward.
123221010.baseFlair_: I can't trust soldiers to get the job done. Humans let emotions cloud their judgement. Humans'll stab you in the back. I've been witness to it.
123221010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
123221010.evoFlair_: Lost this eye to one of my own officers. So no, I'm not babysitting human troops. I've got a battalion of blades I can trust.

127221030.baseEffect_:
Rush.
Fanfare: Give another allied Heroic follower the ability to attack 2 times per turn.

I want our battle to continue, Tsubasa! So I won't lose that easily!
—Ren Kazamatsuri
127221030.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
127221030.evoFlair_:
I'll show you, Tsubasa! This is my real power!
—Ren Kazamatsuri

105231020.baseFlair_: The sword was embedded within the white ridge for ages until fate entrusted it to one young man. The sword spoke to him, saying, "I am thy blade!"
105231020.evoEffect_:
Bane.
Ward.
Follower Strike: Destroy the enemy follower.
105231020.evoFlair_: The young man nodded, and the white ridge blade shone. Having revealed its true form, it began to speak: "I am thy blade, and thou art my comrade! I shall bring you victory!"

109231020.baseEffect_:
Can't be attacked.

109231020.evoFlair_: Recognize the sky not only as a home for birds, but as a new realm of battle. If you desire victory, find the path and take wing to the skies as a single blade. —Next Generation Warfare, Chapter 2

The Third Step: Uproot
The world is full of profiteering thieves and absurd moguls. Steal the soil beneath them, so not a single sprout may take root.
—Teachings of the Usurping Thief

110231030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Destroy an enemy follower with at least 6 attack.
110231030.baseFlair_: I carry a giant sword to fell giant foes. How else would I cut down gods and dragons alike? It is the ambition of every swordsman to learn such technique.
110231030.evoFlair_: I fell giant foes to make my name giant. Why else would I cut down good and evil alike? It is the desire of every swordsman to achieve such superiority.

Whenever this follower takes damage, if it's not destroyed, gain +1/+1 and fully restore its defense (up to 10 times per turn).
118231010.baseFlair_: Hero and leader of Rudelwolf, a newly formed organization of condemners. Often referred to as the Immortal Wolf, he fights with a thirst for a more ideal world.

118231010.evoFlair_: The infernal sigil embedded into his body grants him immortality in exchange for eternal pain. This ravenous warrior stops at nothing to achieve his ideals.

125231030.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give +1/+0 to all Swordcraft followers in your hand and deck.
125231030.baseFlair_: A strategy is only as successful as the people carrying it out. You've all come a long way, and I'm proud of the fine soldiers you've become. With you at my side, our victory is assured!
125231030.evoEffect_: Evolve: Deal 5 damage to an enemy follower.
125231030.evoFlair_: This strategy was only words on a piece of paper, but thanks to all of you, it will become the means to our triumph. I have faith in each and every one of you!

900231040.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, gain +1/+0 and restore 3 defense to this follower.
900231040.baseFlair_: Lancelot, captain of the Order of the White Dragons, has been my best bud since we were little. Yeah... Lancey's really amazing—he's no ordinary childhood friend!
900231040.evoFlair_: Of course I worry about stuff! Right now I want to get as good as Lancey so we can fight side by side as equals... I've still got a long way to go though!

900231050.baseFlair_: I pledged this sword to my country. No matter how my honor is besmirched, I cannot falter in keeping my vow!
900231050.evoFlair_: This sword slayed the great dragon—do not presume you'll escape it so easily. Now, time to meet your end!

900231060.baseEffect_:
Storm.
Strike: Gain +1/+1 if an allied Vane, Indomitable Knight is in play.
900231060.baseFlair_: I've been handed a royal decree from the king to seek knowledge that will benefit our country, but I don't even know where to begin... I think I'll start by observing other lands.
900231060.evoFlair_: There must be something I can do for the people of this kingdom... but what? What should a knight protect? That's the question I have to answer.

900231070.baseEffect_:
Gain Rush while an allied Siegfried, Dragonslayer is in play.
Strike: Gain +X/+0. X equals the number of other allied followers in play.
900231070.baseFlair_: Humph. Plebian riff-raff like this dares to stand in my way to royalty? What insolence. We shall conquer them, vassal! Follow my lead!
900231070.evoFlair_: I want to build a land without war, where even the powerless can live in peace. To do that, I'll need superlative vassals. Captain, won't you aid me?

101241020.baseEffect_:
Ward.

101241020.baseFlair_: She descended upon the chaotic battlefield, a pristine white flower against the darkness. As her ivory blade danced, the wicked fell before her.
101241020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
101241020.evoFlair_: As a blossom bosoms its precious nectar, so too the knight did shield her wards from harm. As a lady of grace so easily ensnares the gaze of onlookers, so too the flash of the knight's blade did bedazzle her foes.

103241010.baseEffect_:
Storm.
Fanfare: Enhance (9) - Can attack 2 times per turn. Reduce damage to 0 until the end of the turn.
103241010.baseFlair_: From this day forth, our order will be known as the Sky Knights! May justice and honor forever be our comrades in arms!
103241010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
103241010.evoFlair_: We brandish our swords to uphold order and to thwart the forces of cruelty and chaos. Let us ride like lightning, my brothers and sisters!

Rush.

106241020.baseFlair_: His beard, crimson like an inferno. His advance, furious like the flames. The people call him the red-bearded king. He is an immortal hero who aids an imperiled kingdom.
106241020.evoFlair_: His blades, silver and shining, cut through the flaming dervish of the battlefield. For great prosperity, and for the people's peace, he continues to reign in red-bearded glory.

110241030.baseEffect_: At the end of your turn, give +1/+1 to all allied Officer followers.
110241030.baseFlair_: My valiant soldiers, let my song be the wind at your backs, spurring you on to glory! Be steadfast and never hesitate! Charge!
110241030.evoEffect_:
Evolve: Put a random 1-play-point and 2-play-point follower from your deck into play.
At the end of your turn, give +1/+1 to all allied Officer followers.
110241030.evoFlair_: My voice shall bolster your fighting spirit and salve your wounds. Thus armed, any one of you is a hero worth a thousand swords! One more march and you shall hear my victory hymn. Onward to glory!

112241030.baseEffect_:
During your turn, when this card is added to your hand from your deck, reveal it and give +1/+0 to a random allied follower.
----------
Fanfare: Evolve another unevolved allied follower whose attack or defense has been increased. (Evolve effects will not activate.)
112241030.baseFlair_: His most impressive feature is that eye of his. Sure, he can read the battlefield like an open book—but that's common enough for all master swordsmen. No, he's got an eye for talent, able to transform those who haven't reached their full potential into true warriors.
112241030.evoFlair_: Sometimes gossip circles about him: "Is that so-called master actually any good with a blade? I bet he's all talk." I advise those rumormongers to laugh while they still can. His true ability is fearsome; his strikes are but flashes of lightning to the untrained eye.

113241020.baseEffect_:
Storm.
Fanfare: Enhance (9) - Randomly put different Levin followers (excluding Albert, Levin Champion) from your deck into play until your area is full.
Strike: Gain +1/+0 if another allied Levin card is in play.
113241020.baseFlair_: A not-yet-champion was born into tragedy. Together with his comrades, he learned the strength of banding together. He reaches out an arm: "Devotion is our power. Into the melee at lightning speed!"
113241020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
113241020.evoFlair_:
Though he cannot forgive his own sins, he excuses those of others. A frozen heart, a burning pain.
"This tragedy will not happen again—not so long as I have a hand in things!"

115241030.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: If at least 1 allied follower has evolved this match, gain Ward.
Then, if at least 3 have evolved, recover 3 play points.
Then, if at least 5 have evolved, restore 5 defense to your leader.
Then, if at least 7 have evolved, draw cards until there are 7 cards in your hand.
115241030.baseFlair_: Hehe. Are you surprised by my appearance? Right now I'm not the chosen harpist of the gods... I'm an ordinary warrior who fights alongside the people! I'll play for you a song of courage!
115241030.evoFlair_: Rather than merely playing my harp from paradise, I want to join with the people to create a new paradise! A mournful melody isn't befitting of a bright future. Come, let the melody of courage resound!

116241020.baseEffect_:

Rush.
Fanfare: Give your leader the following effect - Whenever an allied Machina follower attacks an enemy follower, deal 1 damage to the enemy leader. (This effect is not stackable and lasts for the rest of the match.)
116241020.baseFlair_: Relying on the brute strength of a single soldier, what an archaic strategy. These days heroes are made on the assembly line. Can you argue with such convenience? No. You can't. Now come—let us reactivate our future legend!
116241020.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
116241020.evoFlair_:
Harumph... To trust numbers alone—a foolish notion, that. Shave it down to the core and what's left? Hordes of listless troops? If you won't heed my question, then perhaps the business end of my spear will convince you.
—Patrick, Rhiceros Knight

116241030.baseEffect_:
Fanfare: Randomly put 2 different Officer followers from your deck into your hand.
Enhance (7): Gain the ability to evolve for 0 evolution points and the following effect - The next time this follower takes damage, reduce that damage to 0.
116241030.baseFlair_: One cultivates kindness to protect their friends. One cultivates strength to survive. That's what my father taught me, and I will never forget his words! No matter the despair I face, I will cut it in twain with a flash of my silver blade!
116241030.evoEffect_: Evolve: Until the end of the turn, subtract 3 from the cost of an Officer follower in your hand.
116241030.evoFlair_: Leave your tears in the past and your promises for the grave. That's what he told me, so I won't hang my head any longer. I'll look forward and keep going. Not just for myself—but for everyone who's believed in me so far!

118241010.baseEffect_:

Rush.

118241010.baseFlair_: Welcome to Rivayle, where folk are poor and lives are short. It's eat or be eaten, and that's the way it's always been. But there's tell of a couple of bandit lords who look like haze and fight like hellfire. People call 'em Bunny and Baron. And they're gonna change this here world.
118241010.evoFlair_:
"We're Bunny & Baron. And we're gonna tip the scales."
"Yep. Gotta even out the odds."
"Then let's hop to it, Bun'."
"Damn skippy, Bar'!"
"We're gonna get everything back!"

120241010.baseEffect_:
Storm.
Fanfare: If any other allied followers are in play, gain +2/+0.
Fanfare: Destroy another allied follower.
Enhance (9): Destroy all other followers instead. Gain the following effect: Can attack 2 times per turn.
120241010.baseFlair_: My bloodstained past doesn't burden me—it's all been scorched by bolts of hatred. So why do you insist on putting your hopes in me? Weakness will only shackle you. Voidsent lightning! Strike these weak fools down and release me from my bonds!
120241010.evoEffect_: (Same as the unevolved form, excluding Fanfare.)
120241010.evoFlair_: Only the links that have survived forging can stand here; our bonds are true. Weakness casts you into the void and devours you; it leaves you with no choice but to abandon your humanity. Don't waste my time chaining me with your burdens, as brittle as they are!

125241020.baseEffect_:
Ward.
Fanfare: Rally (7) - Evolve this follower.
Can't be targeted by enemy effects.
125241020.baseFlair_: She blooms proudly upon the battlefield. However, each victory, each moment of glory, is built on a foundation of sacrifice. Though her petals are dyed in blood, her heart remains unblemished, her blade carrying the will of her fallen comrades.

Ward.

Heh, it's moments of spirit like this that define Shadowverse! Your pushover followers are no match for Tatsumi Raido!

My cards grant me unshakable strength! Bring glory to the battlefield! Advance, General Maximus!
—Tatsumi Raido

900241020.evoFlair_: When your hearts are dyed in hope, any hardship can be overcome. All right, victory's in sight! Let's win this battle!

101211130.evoFlair_: From parts unknown the winged auxiliary soared. Soon its braying led the cheers of victory.

101211140.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Give +2/+2 to an allied Officer follower.

101211140.evoFlair_: Listen up and listen well, men! Lack of concentration is the first step to a watery grave! Focus on the task at hand, and see that your enemy beats you to the bottom!

103211040.baseEffect_: Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to all enemy followers if an allied Commander card is in play.

103211040.evoFlair_: To be praised by you is an honor of which I am not worthy, sir. By way of thanks, I'll wield this whip as only I can!

105211020.baseFlair_: It's not just things you can see that I crush. I also crush the spirits of fools who think they can beat me just because they're men.

Ward.
